                <div class="stl_01" style="top:10.7384em; left:5.8775em;"><span class="stl_10 stl_08 stl_09" style="word-spacing:0em;">Elastic Stack</span><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_09" style="word-spacing:0em;">简介 &nbsp;</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:11.989em; left:5.8775em;"><span class="stl_10 stl_08 stl_12">Elasticsearch</span><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_12">的介绍与安装 &nbsp;</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:13.2395em; left:5.8775em;"><span class="stl_10 stl_08 stl_13">Elasticsearch</span><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_13">的快速入门 &nbsp;</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:14.49em; left:5.8775em;"><span class="stl_10 stl_08 stl_13">Elasticsearch</span><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_13">的核心讲解 &nbsp;</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:15.7405em; left:5.8775em;"><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_09">中文分词 &nbsp;</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:16.9911em; left:5.8775em;"><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_09">全文搜索 &nbsp;</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:18.2416em; left:5.8775em;"><span class="stl_10 stl_08 stl_14">Elasticsearch</span><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_14">集群 &nbsp;</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:19.4921em; left:5.8775em;"><span class="stl_10 stl_08 stl_09">Java</span><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_09">客户端讲解 &nbsp;</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:21.3679em; left:4.0017em;"><span class="stl_10 stl_08 stl_09">ꢀ</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:23.3581em; left:4.0017em;"><span class="stl_15 stl_08 stl_09" style="font-weight:bold; word-spacing:0em;">1</span><span class="stl_07 stl_08 stl_09" style="font-weight:bold; word-spacing:0em;">、</span><span class="stl_15 stl_08 stl_09" style="font-weight:bold; word-spacing:0em;">Elastic Stack</span><span class="stl_07 stl_08 stl_09" style="font-weight:bold; word-spacing:0em;">简介 &nbsp;</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:26.4325em; left:4.0017em;"><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_16" style="word-spacing:0.0006em;">如果你没有听说过</span><span class="stl_10 stl_08 stl_16" style="word-spacing:0.0006em;">Elastic Stack</span><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_16" style="word-spacing:0.0006em;">，那你一定听说过</span><span class="stl_10 stl_08 stl_16" style="word-spacing:0.0006em;">ELK</span><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_16" style="word-spacing:0.0006em;">，实际上</span><span class="stl_10 stl_08 stl_16" style="word-spacing:0.0006em;">ELK</span><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_16" style="word-spacing:0.0006em;">是三款软件的简称，分别是</span><span class="stl_10 stl_08 stl_16" style="word-spacing:0.0006em;">Elasticsearch</span><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_16" style="word-spacing:0.0006em;">、 &nbsp;</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:27.6831em; left:4.0017em;"><span class="stl_10 stl_08 stl_09" style="word-spacing:0em;">Logstash</span><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_09" style="word-spacing:0em;">、</span><span class="stl_10 stl_08 stl_09" style="word-spacing:0em;">Kibana</span><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_09" style="word-spacing:0em;">组成，在发展的过程中，又有新成员</span><span class="stl_10 stl_08 stl_09" style="word-spacing:0em;">Beats</span><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_09" style="word-spacing:0em;">的加入，所以就形成了</span><span class="stl_10 stl_08 stl_09" style="word-spacing:0em;">Elastic Stack</span><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_09" style="word-spacing:0em;">。所以说，</span><span class="stl_10 stl_08 stl_09" style="word-spacing:0em;">ELK</span><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_09" style="word-spacing:0em;">是 &nbsp;</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:28.9336em; left:4.0017em;"><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_09" style="word-spacing:0em;">旧的称呼，</span><span class="stl_10 stl_08 stl_09" style="word-spacing:0em;">Elastic Stack</span><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_09" style="word-spacing:0em;">是新的名字。 &nbsp;</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:55.9449em; left:4.0017em;"><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_09" style="word-spacing:0em;">全系的</span><span class="stl_10 stl_08 stl_09" style="word-spacing:0em;">Elastic Stack</span><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_09" style="word-spacing:0em;">技术栈包括： &nbsp;</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:67.063em; left:13.5417em;"><span class="stl_17 stl_18 stl_09">北京市昌平区建材城西路金燕龙办公楼一层 &nbsp;</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:67.063em; left:29.2917em;"><span class="stl_17 stl_18 stl_09">电话：400-618-9090 &nbsp;</span></div>
            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
    <div class="stl_02">
        <div class="stl_03">
            <object data="030213185197_files/img_06.svg" type="image/svg+xml" class="stl_04" style="position:absolute; width:49.5833em; height:70.0833em;">
                <embed src="030213185197_files/img_06.svg" type="image/svg+xml" class="stl_04" />
            </object>
        </div>
        <div class="view">
            <div class="stl_05 stl_06">
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:34.3734em; left:5.1897em;"><span class="stl_19 stl_08 stl_20" style="font-weight:bold;">Elasticsearch &nbsp;</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:36.2492em; left:4.0017em;"><span class="stl_10 stl_08 stl_16" style="word-spacing:0.0007em;">Elasticsearch </span><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_16" style="word-spacing:0.0007em;">基于</span><span class="stl_10 stl_08 stl_16" style="word-spacing:0.0007em;">java</span><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_16" style="word-spacing:0.0007em;">，是个开源分布式搜索引擎，它的特点有：分布式，零配置，自动发现，索引自动分片，索引 &nbsp;</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:37.4997em; left:4.0017em;"><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_21">副本机制，</span><span class="stl_10 stl_08 stl_21">restful</span><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_21">风格接口，多数据源，自动搜索负载等。 &nbsp;</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:39.3755em; left:5.1897em;"><span class="stl_19 stl_08 stl_09" style="font-weight:bold;">Logstash &nbsp;</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:41.3138em; left:4.0017em;"><span class="stl_10 stl_08 stl_09" style="word-spacing:0em;">Logstash </span><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_09" style="word-spacing:0em;">基于</span><span class="stl_10 stl_08 stl_09" style="word-spacing:0em;">java</span><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_09" style="word-spacing:0em;">，是一个开源的用于收集</span><span class="stl_10 stl_08 stl_09" style="word-spacing:0em;">,</span><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_09" style="word-spacing:0em;">分析和存储日志的工具。 &nbsp;</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:43.1896em; left:5.1897em;"><span class="stl_19 stl_08 stl_09" style="font-weight:bold;">Kibana &nbsp;</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:45.1279em; left:4.0017em;"><span class="stl_10 stl_08 stl_16" style="word-spacing:0.0045em;">Kibana </span><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_16" style="word-spacing:0.0045em;">基于</span><span class="stl_10 stl_08 stl_16" style="word-spacing:0.0045em;">nodejs</span><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_16" style="word-spacing:0.0045em;">，也是一个开源和免费的工具，</span><span class="stl_10 stl_08 stl_16" style="word-spacing:0.0045em;">Kibana</span><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_16" style="word-spacing:0.0045em;">可以为 </span><span class="stl_10 stl_08 stl_16" style="word-spacing:0.0045em;">Logstash </span><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_16" style="word-spacing:0.0045em;">和 </span><span class="stl_10 stl_08 stl_16" style="word-spacing:0.0045em;">ElasticSearch </span><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_16" style="word-spacing:0.0045em;">提供的日志分析友好的 &nbsp;</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:46.3784em; left:4.0017em;"><span class="stl_10 stl_08 stl_22" style="word-spacing:0.0019em;">Web </span><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_22" style="word-spacing:0.0019em;">界面，可以汇总、分析和搜索重要数据日志。 &nbsp;</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:48.2542em; left:5.1897em;"><span class="stl_19 stl_08 stl_09" style="font-weight:bold;">Beats &nbsp;</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:50.13em; left:4.0017em;"><span class="stl_10 stl_08 stl_09">Beats</span><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_09">是</span><span class="stl_10 stl_08 stl_09">elastic</span><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_09">公司开源的一款采集系统监控数据的代理</span><span class="stl_10 stl_08 stl_09">agent</span><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_09">，是在被监控服务器上以客户端形式运行的数据收集 &nbsp;</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:51.3805em; left:4.0017em;"><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_23">器的统称，可以直接把数据发送给</span><span class="stl_10 stl_08 stl_23">Elasticsearch</span><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_23">或者通过</span><span class="stl_10 stl_08 stl_23">Logstash</span><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_23">发送给</span><span class="stl_10 stl_08 stl_23">Elasticsearch</span><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_23">，然后进行后续的数据分析活 &nbsp;</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:52.631em; left:4.0017em;"><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_09">动。 &nbsp;</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:54.5694em; left:4.0017em;"><span class="stl_10 stl_08 stl_09">Beats</span><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_09">由如下组成</span><span class="stl_10 stl_08 stl_09">: &nbsp;</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:56.4451em; left:5.8775em;"><span class="stl_10 stl_08 stl_21">Packetbeat</span><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_21">：是一个网络数据包分析器，用于监控、收集网络流量信息，</span><span class="stl_10 stl_08 stl_21">Packetbeat</span><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_21">嗅探服务器之间的流量， &nbsp;</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:57.6957em; left:5.8775em;"><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_09" style="word-spacing:0.0024em;">解析应用层协议，并关联到消息的处理，其支 持</span><span class="stl_10 stl_08 stl_09" style="word-spacing:0.0024em;">ICMP (v4 and v6)</span><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_09" style="word-spacing:0.0024em;">、</span><span class="stl_10 stl_08 stl_09" style="word-spacing:0.0024em;">DNS</span><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_09" style="word-spacing:0.0024em;">、</span><span class="stl_10 stl_08 stl_09" style="word-spacing:0.0024em;">HTTP</span><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_09" style="word-spacing:0.0024em;">、</span><span class="stl_10 stl_08 stl_09" style="word-spacing:0.0024em;">Mysql</span><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_09" style="word-spacing:0.0024em;">、</span><span class="stl_10 stl_08 stl_09" style="word-spacing:0.0024em;">PostgreSQL</span><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_09" style="word-spacing:0.0024em;">、 &nbsp;</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:58.9462em; left:5.8775em;"><span class="stl_10 stl_08 stl_09">Redis</span><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_09">、</span><span class="stl_10 stl_08 stl_09">MongoDB</span><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_09">、</span><span class="stl_10 stl_08 stl_09">Memcache</span><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_09">等协议； &nbsp;</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:60.6344em; left:5.8775em;"><span class="stl_10 stl_08 stl_24" style="word-spacing:0.0058em;">Filebeat</span><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_24" style="word-spacing:0.0058em;">：用于监控、收集服务器日志文件，其已取代 </span><span class="stl_10 stl_08 stl_24" style="word-spacing:0.0058em;">logstash forwarder</span><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_24" style="word-spacing:0.0058em;">； &nbsp;</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:62.2601em; left:5.8775em;"><span class="stl_10 stl_08 stl_21" style="word-spacing:0.0112em;">Metricbeat</span><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_21" style="word-spacing:0.0112em;">：可定期获取外部系统的监控指标信息，其可以监控、收集 </span><span class="stl_10 stl_08 stl_21" style="word-spacing:0.0112em;">Apache</span><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_21" style="word-spacing:0.0112em;">、</span><span class="stl_10 stl_08 stl_21" style="word-spacing:0.0112em;">HAProxy</span><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_21" style="word-spacing:0.0112em;">、</span><span class="stl_10 stl_08 stl_21" style="word-spacing:0.0112em;">MongoDB &nbsp;</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:63.9483em; left:5.8775em;"><span class="stl_10 stl_08 stl_25">MySQL</span><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_25">、</span><span class="stl_10 stl_08 stl_25">Nginx</span><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_25">、</span><span class="stl_10 stl_08 stl_25">PostgreSQL</span><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_25">、</span><span class="stl_10 stl_08 stl_25">Redis</span><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_25">、</span><span class="stl_10 stl_08 stl_25">System</span><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_25">、</span><span class="stl_10 stl_08 stl_25">Zookeeper</span><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_25">等服务； &nbsp;</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:67.063em; left:13.5417em;"><span class="stl_17 stl_18 stl_09">北京市昌平区建材城西路金燕龙办公楼一层 &nbsp;</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:67.063em; left:29.2917em;"><span class="stl_17 stl_18 stl_09">电话：400-618-9090 &nbsp;</span></div>
            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
    <div class="stl_02">
        <div class="stl_03">

        <div class="view">
            <div class="stl_05 stl_06">
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:4.9235em; left:5.8775em;"><span class="stl_10 stl_08 stl_23">Winlogbeat</span><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_23">：用于监控、收集</span><span class="stl_10 stl_08 stl_23">Windows</span><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_23">系统的日志信息； &nbsp;</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:6.9137em; left:4.0017em;"><span class="stl_15 stl_08 stl_14" style="font-weight:bold;">2</span><span class="stl_07 stl_08 stl_14" style="font-weight:bold;">、</span><span class="stl_15 stl_08 stl_14" style="font-weight:bold;">Elasticsearch &nbsp;</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:10.0228em; left:4.0017em;"><span class="stl_26 stl_08 stl_09" style="font-weight:bold;">2</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:10.0228em; left:4.6976em;"><span class="stl_26 stl_08 stl_09" style="font-weight:bold;">.1</span><span class="stl_27 stl_08 stl_09" style="font-weight:bold;">、简介 &nbsp;</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:24.1191em; left:4.0017em;"><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_28">官网：</span><a href="https://www.elastic.co/cn/products/elasticsearch" target="_blank"><span class="stl_29 stl_08 stl_28">https://www.elastic.co/cn/products/elasticsearch &nbsp;</span></a></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:51.8528em; left:4.0017em;"><span class="stl_26 stl_08 stl_09" style="font-weight:bold;">2</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:51.8528em; left:4.6976em;"><span class="stl_26 stl_08 stl_09" style="font-weight:bold;">.2</span><span class="stl_27 stl_08 stl_09" style="font-weight:bold;">、安装 &nbsp;</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:54.2741em; left:4.0017em;"><span class="stl_30 stl_08 stl_09" style="font-weight:bold;">2</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:54.2741em; left:4.5816em;"><span class="stl_30 stl_08 stl_09" style="font-weight:bold;">.2.1</span><span class="stl_31 stl_08 stl_09" style="font-weight:bold;">、版本说明 &nbsp;</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:56.5077em; left:4.0017em;"><span class="stl_10 stl_08 stl_16">Elasticsearch</span><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_16">的发展是非常快速的，所以在</span><span class="stl_10 stl_08 stl_16">ES5.0</span><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_16">之前，</span><span class="stl_10 stl_08 stl_16">ELK</span><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_16">的各个版本都不统一，出现了版本号混乱的状态，所以 &nbsp;</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:57.7582em; left:4.0017em;"><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_09" style="word-spacing:0em;">从</span><span class="stl_10 stl_08 stl_09" style="word-spacing:0em;">5.0</span><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_09" style="word-spacing:0em;">开始，所有</span><span class="stl_10 stl_08 stl_09" style="word-spacing:0em;">Elastic Stack</span><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_09" style="word-spacing:0em;">中的项目全部统一版本号。目前最新版本是</span><span class="stl_10 stl_08 stl_09" style="word-spacing:0em;">6.5.4</span><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_09" style="word-spacing:0em;">，我们将基于这一版本进行学习。 &nbsp;</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:67.063em; left:13.5417em;"><span class="stl_17 stl_18 stl_09">北京市昌平区建材城西路金燕龙办公楼一层 &nbsp;</span></div>

        <div class="stl_03">

        <div class="view">
            <div class="stl_05 stl_06">
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:26.8875em; left:4.0017em;"><span class="stl_30 stl_08 stl_09" style="font-weight:bold;">2</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:26.8875em; left:4.5816em;"><span class="stl_30 stl_08 stl_09" style="font-weight:bold;">.2.2</span><span class="stl_31 stl_08 stl_09" style="font-weight:bold;">、下载 &nbsp;</span></div>

                <div class="stl_01" style="top:34.3734em; left:4.0017em;"><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_16">由于</span><span class="stl_10 stl_08 stl_16">ES</span><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_16">官方并没有为</span><span class="stl_10 stl_08 stl_16">ES</span><a href="https://github.com/mobz/elasticsearch-head" target="_blank"><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_16">提供界面管理工具，仅仅是提供了后台的服务。</span></a><a href="https://github.com/mobz/elasticsearch-head" target="_blank"><span class="stl_10 stl_08 stl_16">elasticsearch-head</span></a><a href="https://github.com/mobz/elasticsearch-head" target="_blank"><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_16">是一个为</span></a><span class="stl_10 stl_08 stl_16">ES</span><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_16">开发的一个页 &nbsp;</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:35.6239em; left:4.0017em;"><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_24">面客户端工具，其源码托管于</span><span class="stl_10 stl_08 stl_24">GitHub</span><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_24">，地址为：</span><a href="https://github.com/mobz/elasticsearch-head" target="_blank"><span class="stl_29 stl_08 stl_24">https://github.com/mobz/elasticsearch-head &nbsp;</span></a></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:37.4997em; left:4.0017em;"><span class="stl_10 stl_08 stl_09">head</span><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_09">提供了</span><span class="stl_10 stl_08 stl_09">4</span><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_09">种安装方式： &nbsp;</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:39.438em; left:5.8775em;"><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_09" style="word-spacing:0em;">源码安装，通过</span><span class="stl_10 stl_08 stl_09" style="word-spacing:0em;">npm run start</span><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_09" style="word-spacing:0em;">启动（不推荐） &nbsp;</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:40.6885em; left:5.8775em;"><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_48">通过</span><span class="stl_10 stl_08 stl_48">docker</span><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_48">安装（推荐） &nbsp;</span></div>

                <div class="stl_01" style="top:43.1896em; left:5.8775em;"><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_09">通过</span><span class="stl_10 stl_08 stl_09">ES</span><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_09">的</span><span class="stl_10 stl_08 stl_09">plugin</span><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_09">方式安装（不推荐） &nbsp;</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:45.0654em; left:5.1897em;"><span class="stl_50 stl_08 stl_51">通过</span><span class="stl_52 stl_08 stl_51">docker</span><span class="stl_50 stl_08 stl_51">安装 &nbsp;</span></div>

                <div class="stl_01" style="top:47.6971em; left:6.3152em;"><span class="stl_33 stl_08 stl_09">#</span><span class="stl_34 stl_08 stl_09">拉取镜像 &nbsp;</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:48.8225em; left:6.3152em;"><span class="stl_35 stl_08 stl_09" style="word-spacing:0em;">docker pull mobz/elasticsearch-head:5 &nbsp;</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:51.0735em; left:6.3152em;"><span class="stl_33 stl_08 stl_09">#</span><span class="stl_34 stl_08 stl_09">创建容器 &nbsp;</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:52.199em; left:6.3152em;"><span class="stl_35 stl_08 stl_09" style="word-spacing:-0.0004em;">docker create </span><span class="stl_36 stl_08 stl_09" style="word-spacing:-0.0004em;">--name </span><span class="stl_35 stl_08 stl_09" style="word-spacing:-0.0004em;">elasticsearch-head </span><span class="stl_36 stl_08 stl_09" style="word-spacing:-0.0004em;">-p </span><span class="stl_38 stl_08 stl_09" style="word-spacing:-0.0004em;">9100</span><span class="stl_35 stl_08 stl_09" style="word-spacing:-0.0004em;">:9100 mobz/elasticsearch-head:5 &nbsp;</span></div>

                <div class="stl_01" style="top:19.9298em; left:5.1897em;"><span class="stl_50 stl_08 stl_09">注意： &nbsp;</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:21.8056em; left:5.1897em;"><span class="stl_50 stl_08 stl_24">由于前后端分离开发，所以会存在跨域问题，需要在服务端做</span><span class="stl_52 stl_08 stl_24">CORS</span><span class="stl_50 stl_08 stl_24">的配置，如下： &nbsp;</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:23.6814em; left:5.1897em;"><span class="stl_52 stl_08 stl_12" style="word-spacing:0.0022em;">vim elasticsearch.yml &nbsp;</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:25.6197em; left:5.1897em;"><span class="stl_52 stl_08 stl_24" style="word-spacing:0.0009em;">http.cors.enabled: true http.cors.allow-origin: "*" &nbsp;</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:27.4955em; left:6.8154em;"><span class="stl_53 stl_08 stl_54" style="font-style:italic;">chrome &nbsp;</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:29.4338em; left:5.1897em;"><span class="stl_52 stl_08 stl_20">chrome</span><span class="stl_50 stl_08 stl_20">插件的方式安装 &nbsp;</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:31.3096em; left:4.0017em;"><a href="https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/elasticsearch-head/ffmkiejjmecolpfloofpjologoblkegm" target="_blank"><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_47">打开</span></a><a href="https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/elasticsearch-head/ffmkiejjmecolpfloofpjologoblkegm" target="_blank"><span class="stl_10 stl_08 stl_47">chrome</span></a><a href="https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/elasticsearch-head/ffmkiejjmecolpfloofpjologoblkegm" target="_blank"><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_47">的应用商店，即可安装</span></a><a href="https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/elasticsearch-head/ffmkiejjmecolpfloofpjologoblkegm" target="_blank"><span class="stl_29 stl_08 stl_47">https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/elasticsearch-head/ﬀmkiejjmec &nbsp;</span></a></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:32.5601em; left:4.0017em;"><a href="https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/elasticsearch-head/ffmkiejjmecolpfloofpjologoblkegm" target="_blank"><span class="stl_29 stl_08 stl_12">olpﬂoofpjologoblkegm &nbsp;</span></a></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:48.6294em; left:5.1897em;"><span class="stl_50 stl_08 stl_24">建议：推荐使用</span><span class="stl_52 stl_08 stl_24">chrome</span><span class="stl_50 stl_08 stl_24">插件的方式安装，如果网络环境不允许，就采用其它方式安装。 &nbsp;</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:50.7274em; left:4.0017em;"><span class="stl_26 stl_08 stl_09" style="font-weight:bold;">2</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:50.7274em; left:4.6976em;"><span class="stl_26 stl_08 stl_09" style="font-weight:bold;">.3</span><span class="stl_27 stl_08 stl_09" style="font-weight:bold;">、基本概念 &nbsp;</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:53.1938em; left:5.1897em;"><span class="stl_55 stl_08 stl_09" style="font-weight:bold;">索引 &nbsp;</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:55.0696em; left:5.8775em;"><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_47">索引（</span><span class="stl_10 stl_08 stl_47">index</span><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_47">）是</span><span class="stl_10 stl_08 stl_47">Elasticsearch</span><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_47">对逻辑数据的逻辑存储，所以它可以分为更小的部分。 &nbsp;</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:56.3201em; left:5.8775em;"><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_09">可以把索引看成关系型数据库的表，索引的结构是为快速有效的全文索引准备的，特别是它不存储原始值。 &nbsp;</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:57.5706em; left:5.8775em;"><span class="stl_10 stl_08 stl_21">Elasticsearch</span><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_21">可以把索引存放在一台机器或者分散在多台服务器上，每个索引有一或多个分片（</span><span class="stl_10 stl_08 stl_21">shard</span><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_21">），每个 &nbsp;</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:58.8212em; left:5.8775em;"><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_12">分片可以有多个副本（</span><span class="stl_10 stl_08 stl_12">replica</span><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_12">）。 &nbsp;</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:60.7595em; left:5.1897em;"><span class="stl_55 stl_08 stl_09" style="font-weight:bold;">文档 &nbsp;</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:62.6353em; left:5.8775em;"><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_16">存储在</span><span class="stl_10 stl_08 stl_16">Elasticsearch</span><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_16">中的主要实体叫文档（</span><span class="stl_10 stl_08 stl_16">document</span><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_16">）。用关系型数据库来类比的话，一个文档相当于数据库 &nbsp;</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:63.8858em; left:5.8775em;"><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_09">表中的一行记录。 &nbsp;</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:67.063em; left:13.5417em;"><span class="stl_17 stl_18 stl_09">北京市昌平区建材城西路金燕龙办公楼一层 &nbsp;</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:67.063em; left:29.2917em;"><span class="stl_17 stl_18 stl_09">电话：400-618-9090 &nbsp;</span></div>

        </div>

    <div class="stl_02">
        <div class="stl_03">
            <object data="030213185197_files/img_18.svg" type="image/svg+xml" class="stl_04" style="position:absolute; width:49.5833em; height:70.0833em;">
                <embed src="030213185197_files/img_18.svg" type="image/svg+xml" class="stl_04" />
            </object>
        </div>
        <div class="view">
            <div class="stl_05 stl_06">
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:4.9235em; left:5.8775em;"><span class="stl_10 stl_08 stl_23">Elasticsearch</span><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_23">和</span><span class="stl_10 stl_08 stl_23">MongoDB</span><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_23">中的文档类似，都可以有不同的结构，但</span><span class="stl_10 stl_08 stl_23">Elasticsearch</span><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_23">的文档中，相同字段必须有相 &nbsp;</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:6.174em; left:5.8775em;"><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_09">同类型。 &nbsp;</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:7.4246em; left:5.8775em;"><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_09">文档由多个字段组成，每个字段可能多次出现在一个文档里，这样的字段叫多值字段（</span><span class="stl_10 stl_08 stl_09">multivalued</span><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_09">）。 &nbsp;</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:8.6751em; left:5.8775em;"><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_09">每个字段的类型，可以是文本、数值、日期等。字段类型也可以是复杂类型，一个字段包含其他子文档或者数 &nbsp;</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:9.9256em; left:5.8775em;"><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_09">组。 &nbsp;</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:11.8014em; left:5.1897em;"><span class="stl_55 stl_08 stl_09" style="font-weight:bold;">映射 &nbsp;</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:13.7397em; left:5.8775em;"><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_09">所有文档写进索引之前都会先进行分析，如何将输入的文本分割为词条、哪些词条又会被过滤，这种行为叫做 &nbsp;</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:14.9902em; left:5.8775em;"><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_09">映射（</span><span class="stl_10 stl_08 stl_09">mapping</span><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_09">）。一般由用户自己定义规则。 &nbsp;</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:16.866em; left:5.1897em;"><span class="stl_55 stl_08 stl_09" style="font-weight:bold;">文档类型 &nbsp;</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:18.8043em; left:5.8775em;"><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_56">在</span><span class="stl_10 stl_08 stl_56">Elasticsearch</span><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_56">中，一个索引对象可以存储很多不同用途的对象。例如，一个博客应用程序可以保存文章和评 &nbsp;</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:20.0549em; left:5.8775em;"><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_09">论。 &nbsp;</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:21.3054em; left:5.8775em;"><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_09">每个文档可以有不同的结构。 &nbsp;</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:22.5559em; left:5.8775em;"><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_09">不同的文档类型不能为相同的属性设置不同的类型。例如，在同一索引中的所有文档类型中，一个叫</span><span class="stl_10 stl_08 stl_09">title</span><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_09">的字段 &nbsp;</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:23.8064em; left:5.8775em;"><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_09">必须具有相同的类型。 &nbsp;</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:25.9044em; left:4.0017em;"><span class="stl_26 stl_08 stl_09" style="font-weight:bold;">2</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:25.9044em; left:4.6976em;"><span class="stl_26 stl_08 stl_09" style="font-weight:bold; word-spacing:0em;">.4</span><span class="stl_27 stl_08 stl_09" style="font-weight:bold; word-spacing:0em;">、</span><span class="stl_26 stl_08 stl_09" style="font-weight:bold; word-spacing:0em;">RESTful API &nbsp;</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:28.3709em; left:4.0017em;"><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_16" style="word-spacing:0.0007em;">在</span><span class="stl_10 stl_08 stl_16" style="word-spacing:0.0007em;">Elasticsearch</span><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_16" style="word-spacing:0.0007em;">中，提供了功能丰富的</span><span class="stl_10 stl_08 stl_16" style="word-spacing:0.0007em;">RESTful API</span><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_16" style="word-spacing:0.0007em;">的操作，包括基本的</span><span class="stl_10 stl_08 stl_16" style="word-spacing:0.0007em;">CRUD</span><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_16" style="word-spacing:0.0007em;">、创建索引、删除索引等操作。 &nbsp;</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:30.389em; left:4.0017em;"><span class="stl_30 stl_08 stl_09" style="font-weight:bold;">2</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:30.389em; left:4.5816em;"><span class="stl_30 stl_08 stl_09" style="font-weight:bold;">.4.1</span><span class="stl_31 stl_08 stl_09" style="font-weight:bold;">、创建非结构化索引 &nbsp;</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:32.6226em; left:4.0017em;"><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_16">在</span><span class="stl_10 stl_08 stl_16">Lucene</span><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_16">中，创建索引是需要定义字段名称以及字段的类型的，在</span><span class="stl_10 stl_08 stl_16">Elasticsearch</span><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_16">中提供了非结构化的索引，就是不 &nbsp;</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:33.8732em; left:4.0017em;"><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_56">需要创建索引结构，即可写入数据到索引中，实际上在</span><span class="stl_10 stl_08 stl_56">Elasticsearch</span><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_56">底层会进行结构化操作，此操作对用户是透明 &nbsp;</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:35.1237em; left:4.0017em;"><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_09">的。 &nbsp;</span></div>

                <div class="stl_01" style="top:17.5538em; left:4.0017em;"><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_20">其中，</span><span class="stl_10 stl_08 stl_20">card</span><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_20">是一个复杂对象，嵌套的</span><span class="stl_10 stl_08 stl_20">Card</span><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_20">对象。 &nbsp;</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:19.4296em; left:5.1897em;"><span class="stl_50 stl_08 stl_09">元数据（</span><span class="stl_52 stl_08 stl_09">metadata</span><span class="stl_50 stl_08 stl_09">） &nbsp;</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:21.3679em; left:4.0017em;"><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_09">一个文档不只有数据。它还包含了元数据</span><span class="stl_10 stl_08 stl_09">(metadata)——</span><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_09">关于文档的信息。三个必须的元数据节点是： &nbsp;</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:23.994em; left:4.877em;"><span class="stl_60 stl_08 stl_09" style="font-weight:bold;">节点 &nbsp;</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:23.994em; left:19.1956em;"><span class="stl_60 stl_08 stl_09" style="font-weight:bold;">说明 &nbsp;</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:26.1255em; left:5.0646em;"><span class="stl_35 stl_08 stl_09">_</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:28.2514em; left:5.0646em;"><span class="stl_35 stl_08 stl_09">_</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:30.3773em; left:5.0646em;"><span class="stl_35 stl_08 stl_09">_</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:26.1255em; left:5.5054em;"><span class="stl_35 stl_08 stl_09">index &nbsp;</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:26.0574em; left:19.1956em;"><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_09">文档存储的地方 &nbsp;</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:28.1833em; left:19.1956em;"><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_09">文档代表的对象的类 &nbsp;</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:30.3092em; left:19.1956em;"><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_09">文档的唯一标识 &nbsp;</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:28.2514em; left:5.5054em;"><span class="stl_35 stl_08 stl_09">type &nbsp;</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:30.3773em; left:5.5054em;"><span class="stl_35 stl_08 stl_09">id &nbsp;</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:33.0603em; left:5.1897em;"><span class="stl_19 stl_08 stl_54" style="font-weight:bold;">_index &nbsp;</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:34.9361em; left:4.0017em;"><span class="stl_60 stl_08 stl_24" style="font-weight:bold;">索引</span><span class="stl_59 stl_08 stl_24" style="font-weight:bold;">(index)</span><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_24">类似于关系型数据库里的</span><span class="stl_10 stl_08 stl_24">“</span><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_24">数据库</span><span class="stl_10 stl_08 stl_24">”——</span><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_24">它是我们存储和索引关联数据的地方。 &nbsp;</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:36.8744em; left:5.1897em;"><span class="stl_55 stl_08 stl_09" style="font-weight:bold;">提示： &nbsp;</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:38.7502em; left:5.1897em;"><span class="stl_50 stl_08 stl_56">事实上，我们的数据被存储和索引在</span><span class="stl_55 stl_08 stl_56" style="font-weight:bold;">分片</span><span class="stl_19 stl_08 stl_56" style="font-weight:bold;">(shards)</span><span class="stl_50 stl_08 stl_56">中，索引只是一个把一个或多个分片分组在一起的逻辑空 &nbsp;</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:40.0007em; left:5.1897em;"><span class="stl_50 stl_08 stl_09">间。然而，这只是一些内部细节</span><span class="stl_52 stl_08 stl_09">——</span><span class="stl_50 stl_08 stl_09">我们的程序完全不用关心分片。对于我们的程序而言，文档存储在</span><span class="stl_55 stl_08 stl_09" style="font-weight:bold;">索引 &nbsp;</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:41.2512em; left:5.1897em;"><span class="stl_19 stl_08 stl_09" style="font-weight:bold;">(</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:41.2512em; left:5.4651em;"><span class="stl_19 stl_08 stl_49" style="font-weight:bold;">index)</span><span class="stl_50 stl_08 stl_49">中。剩下的细节由</span><span class="stl_52 stl_08 stl_49">Elasticsearch</span><span class="stl_50 stl_08 stl_49">关心既可。 &nbsp;</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:43.1895em; left:5.1897em;"><span class="stl_19 stl_08 stl_09" style="font-weight:bold;">_type &nbsp;</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:45.0654em; left:4.0017em;"><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_09">在应用中，我们使用对象表示一些</span><span class="stl_10 stl_08 stl_09">“</span><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_09">事物</span><span class="stl_10 stl_08 stl_09">”</span><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_09">，例如一个用户、一篇博客、一个评论，或者一封邮件。每个对象都属于一 &nbsp;</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:46.3158em; left:4.0017em;"><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_64" style="word-spacing:-0.0276em;">个</span><span class="stl_60 stl_08 stl_64" style="font-weight:bold; word-spacing:-0.0276em;">类</span><span class="stl_59 stl_08 stl_64" style="font-weight:bold; word-spacing:-0.0276em;">(class)</span><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_64" style="word-spacing:-0.0276em;">，这个类定义了属性或与对象关联的数据。 </span><span class="stl_35 stl_08 stl_65" style="word-spacing:-0.0306em;">user</span><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_64" style="word-spacing:-0.0276em;">类的对象可能包含姓名、性别、年龄和</span><span class="stl_10 stl_08 stl_64" style="word-spacing:-0.0276em;">Email</span><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_64" style="word-spacing:-0.0276em;">地址。 &nbsp;</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:48.2542em; left:4.0017em;"><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_56">在关系型数据库中，我们经常将相同类的对象存储在一个表里，因为它们有着相同的结构。同理，在</span><span class="stl_10 stl_08 stl_56">Elasticsearch &nbsp;</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:49.5046em; left:4.0017em;"><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_09">中，我们使用相同</span><span class="stl_60 stl_08 stl_09" style="font-weight:bold;">类型</span><span class="stl_59 stl_08 stl_09" style="font-weight:bold;">(type)</span><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_09">的文档表示相同的</span><span class="stl_10 stl_08 stl_09">“</span><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_09">事物</span><span class="stl_10 stl_08 stl_09">”</span><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_09">，因为他们的数据结构也是相同的。 &nbsp;</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:51.443em; left:4.0017em;"><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_09">每个</span><span class="stl_60 stl_08 stl_09" style="font-weight:bold;">类型</span><span class="stl_59 stl_08 stl_09" style="font-weight:bold;">(type)</span><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_09">都有自己的</span><span class="stl_60 stl_08 stl_09" style="font-weight:bold;">映射</span><span class="stl_59 stl_08 stl_09" style="font-weight:bold;">(mapping)</span><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_09">或者结构定义，就像传统数据库表中的列一样。所有类型下的文档被存储 &nbsp;</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:52.6936em; left:4.0017em;"><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_56">在同一个索引下，但是类型的</span><span class="stl_60 stl_08 stl_56" style="font-weight:bold;">映射</span><span class="stl_59 stl_08 stl_56" style="font-weight:bold;">(mapping)</span><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_56">会告诉</span><span class="stl_10 stl_08 stl_56">Elasticsearch</span><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_56">不同的文档如何被索引。 &nbsp;</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:54.5694em; left:4.1893em;"><span class="stl_35 stl_08 stl_66" style="word-spacing:-0.0463em;">_type</span><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_67" style="word-spacing:-0.0417em;">的名字可以是大写或小写，不能包含下划线或逗号。我们将使用 </span><span class="stl_35 stl_08 stl_66" style="word-spacing:-0.0463em;">blog</span><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_67" style="word-spacing:-0.0417em;">做为类型名。 &nbsp;</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:56.5077em; left:5.1897em;"><span class="stl_19 stl_08 stl_09" style="font-weight:bold;">_id &nbsp;</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:58.446em; left:4.0017em;"><span class="stl_59 stl_08 stl_68" style="font-weight:bold; word-spacing:-0.0341em;">id</span><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_68" style="word-spacing:-0.0341em;">仅仅是一个字符串，它与 </span><span class="stl_35 stl_08 stl_69" style="word-spacing:-0.0379em;">_index</span><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_68" style="word-spacing:-0.0341em;">和 </span><span class="stl_35 stl_08 stl_69" style="word-spacing:-0.0379em;">_type</span><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_68" style="word-spacing:-0.0341em;">组合时，就可以在</span><span class="stl_10 stl_08 stl_68" style="word-spacing:-0.0341em;">Elasticsearch</span><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_68" style="word-spacing:-0.0341em;">中唯一标识一个文档。当创建一个文 &nbsp;</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:59.759em; left:4.0017em;"><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_70" style="word-spacing:-0.0295em;">档，你可以自定义 </span><span class="stl_35 stl_08 stl_71" style="word-spacing:-0.0328em;">_id</span><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_70" style="word-spacing:-0.0295em;">，也可以让</span><span class="stl_10 stl_08 stl_70" style="word-spacing:-0.0295em;">Elasticsearch</span><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_70" style="word-spacing:-0.0295em;">帮你自动生成（</span><span class="stl_10 stl_08 stl_70" style="word-spacing:-0.0295em;">32</span><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_70" style="word-spacing:-0.0295em;">位长度）。 &nbsp;</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:61.9195em; left:4.0017em;"><span class="stl_26 stl_08 stl_09" style="font-weight:bold;">3</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:61.9195em; left:4.6976em;"><span class="stl_26 stl_08 stl_09" style="font-weight:bold;">.2</span><span class="stl_27 stl_08 stl_09" style="font-weight:bold;">、查询响应 &nbsp;</span></div>

                <div class="stl_01" style="top:67.063em; left:29.2917em;"><span class="stl_17 stl_18 stl_09">电话：400-618-9090 &nbsp;</span></div>
            </div>
        </div>
    </div>

                <div class="stl_01" style="top:4.8782em; left:4.0017em;"><span class="stl_30 stl_08 stl_09" style="font-weight:bold;">3</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:4.8782em; left:4.5816em;"><span class="stl_30 stl_08 stl_72" style="font-weight:bold;">.2.1</span><span class="stl_31 stl_08 stl_72" style="font-weight:bold;">、</span><span class="stl_30 stl_08 stl_72" style="font-weight:bold;">pretty &nbsp;</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:7.1119em; left:4.0017em;"><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_23">可以在查询</span><span class="stl_10 stl_08 stl_23">url</span><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_23">后面添加</span><span class="stl_10 stl_08 stl_23">pretty</span><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_23">参数，使得返回的</span><span class="stl_10 stl_08 stl_23">json</span><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_23">更易查看。 &nbsp;</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:30.7016em; left:4.0017em;"><span class="stl_30 stl_08 stl_09" style="font-weight:bold;">3</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:30.7016em; left:4.5816em;"><span class="stl_30 stl_08 stl_09" style="font-weight:bold;">.2.2</span><span class="stl_31 stl_08 stl_09" style="font-weight:bold;">、指定响应字段 &nbsp;</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:32.9351em; left:4.0017em;"><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_09">在响应的数据中，如果我们不需要全部的字段，可以指定某些需要的字段进行返回。 &nbsp;</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:35.5669em; left:5.3743em;"><span class="stl_32 stl_08 stl_09">1</span></div>

                <div class="stl_01" style="top:41.1943em; left:5.3743em;"><span class="stl_32 stl_08 stl_09">6</span></div>

                <div class="stl_01" style="top:45.6961em; left:5.3745em;"><span class="stl_32 stl_08 stl_09">0</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:46.8216em; left:5.3745em;"><span class="stl_32 stl_08 stl_09">1</span></div>

                <div class="stl_01" style="top:35.5669em; left:6.8154em;"><span class="stl_35 stl_08 stl_39" style="word-spacing:0.0001em;">GET /haoke/user/1005</span><span class="stl_40 stl_08 stl_39" style="word-spacing:0.0001em;">?_source</span><span class="stl_41 stl_08 stl_39" style="word-spacing:0.0001em;">=</span><span class="stl_35 stl_08 stl_39" style="word-spacing:0.0001em;">id,name &nbsp;</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:36.6924em; left:6.8154em;"><span class="stl_33 stl_08 stl_09">#</span><span class="stl_34 stl_08 stl_09">响应 &nbsp;</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:37.8179em; left:6.8154em;"><span class="stl_35 stl_08 stl_09">{</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:38.9434em; left:7.2562em;"><span class="stl_35 stl_08 stl_39" style="word-spacing:0em;">ꢀ ꢀ</span><span class="stl_43 stl_08 stl_39" style="word-spacing:0em;">"_index"</span><span class="stl_35 stl_08 stl_39" style="word-spacing:0em;">: </span><span class="stl_43 stl_08 stl_39" style="word-spacing:0em;">"haoke"</span><span class="stl_35 stl_08 stl_39" style="word-spacing:0em;">, &nbsp;</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:40.0688em; left:7.2562em;"><span class="stl_35 stl_08 stl_39" style="word-spacing:0em;">ꢀ ꢀ</span><span class="stl_43 stl_08 stl_39" style="word-spacing:0em;">"_type"</span><span class="stl_35 stl_08 stl_39" style="word-spacing:0em;">: </span><span class="stl_43 stl_08 stl_39" style="word-spacing:0em;">"user"</span><span class="stl_35 stl_08 stl_39" style="word-spacing:0em;">, &nbsp;</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:41.1943em; left:7.2562em;"><span class="stl_35 stl_08 stl_44" style="word-spacing:0.0001em;">ꢀ ꢀ</span><span class="stl_43 stl_08 stl_44" style="word-spacing:0.0001em;">"_id"</span><span class="stl_35 stl_08 stl_44" style="word-spacing:0.0001em;">: </span><span class="stl_43 stl_08 stl_44" style="word-spacing:0.0001em;">"1005"</span><span class="stl_35 stl_08 stl_44" style="word-spacing:0.0001em;">, &nbsp;</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:42.3197em; left:7.2562em;"><span class="stl_35 stl_08 stl_44" style="word-spacing:0.0001em;">ꢀ ꢀ</span><span class="stl_43 stl_08 stl_44" style="word-spacing:0.0001em;">"_version"</span><span class="stl_35 stl_08 stl_44" style="word-spacing:0.0001em;">: </span><span class="stl_38 stl_08 stl_44" style="word-spacing:0.0001em;">1</span><span class="stl_35 stl_08 stl_44" style="word-spacing:0.0001em;">, &nbsp;</span></div>

                <div class="stl_01" style="top:46.8216em; left:7.2562em;"><span class="stl_35 stl_08 stl_44" style="word-spacing:0.0003em;">ꢀ ꢀ ꢀ ꢀ</span><span class="stl_43 stl_08 stl_44" style="word-spacing:0.0003em;">"id"</span><span class="stl_35 stl_08 stl_44" style="word-spacing:0.0003em;">: </span><span class="stl_38 stl_08 stl_44" style="word-spacing:0.0003em;">1005 &nbsp;</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:47.9471em; left:7.2562em;"><span class="stl_35 stl_08 stl_09" style="word-spacing:0.6025em;">ꢀ } &nbsp;</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:45.6961em; left:4.9337em;"><span class="stl_32 stl_08 stl_09">1</span></div>

                <div class="stl_01" style="top:51.6931em; left:4.0017em;"><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_09">如不需要返回元数据，仅仅返回原始数据，可以这样： &nbsp;</span></div>

                <div class="stl_01" style="top:27.3135em; left:7.2562em;"><span class="stl_35 stl_08 stl_39" style="word-spacing:0.0002em;">ꢀ ꢀ ꢀ ꢀ ꢀ ꢀ ꢀ ꢀ</span><span class="stl_58 stl_08 stl_39" style="word-spacing:0.0002em;">"_primary_term"</span><span class="stl_35 stl_08 stl_39" style="word-spacing:0.0002em;">: </span><span class="stl_38 stl_08 stl_39" style="word-spacing:0.0002em;">1</span><span class="stl_35 stl_08 stl_39" style="word-spacing:0.0002em;">, &nbsp;</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:28.4388em; left:7.2562em;"><span class="stl_35 stl_08 stl_44" style="word-spacing:0.0003em;">ꢀ ꢀ ꢀ ꢀ ꢀ ꢀ ꢀ ꢀ</span><span class="stl_58 stl_08 stl_44" style="word-spacing:0.0003em;">"status"</span><span class="stl_35 stl_08 stl_44" style="word-spacing:0.0003em;">: </span><span class="stl_38 stl_08 stl_44" style="word-spacing:0.0003em;">200 &nbsp;</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:29.5643em; left:7.2562em;"><span class="stl_35 stl_08 stl_09" style="word-spacing:0em;">ꢀ ꢀ</span><span class="stl_35 stl_08 stl_09" style="word-spacing:0em;"> ꢀ</span><span class="stl_35 stl_08 stl_09" style="word-spacing:0em;"> ꢀ</span><span class="stl_35 stl_08 stl_09" style="word-spacing:0em;"> ꢀ</span><span class="stl_35 stl_08 stl_09" style="word-spacing:0em;"> } &nbsp;</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:27.3135em; left:5.3745em;"><span class="stl_32 stl_08 stl_09">2</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:28.4388em; left:5.3745em;"><span class="stl_32 stl_08 stl_09">3</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:29.5643em; left:5.3745em;"><span class="stl_32 stl_08 stl_09">4</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:30.6898em; left:5.3745em;"><span class="stl_32 stl_08 stl_09">5</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:30.6898em; left:7.2562em;"><span class="stl_35 stl_08 stl_09" style="word-spacing:0em;">ꢀ ꢀ</span><span class="stl_35 stl_08 stl_09" style="word-spacing:0em;"> ꢀ</span><span class="stl_35 stl_08 stl_09" style="word-spacing:0em;"> } &nbsp;</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:31.8153em; left:5.3745em;"><span class="stl_32 stl_08 stl_09">6</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:31.8153em; left:7.2562em;"><span class="stl_35 stl_08 stl_09" style="word-spacing:0.6025em;">ꢀ ] &nbsp;</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:32.9408em; left:5.3745em;"><span class="stl_32 stl_08 stl_09" style="word-spacing:0.7645em;">7 </span><span class="stl_35 stl_08 stl_09" style="word-spacing:0.7645em;">} &nbsp;</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:35.5613em; left:4.0017em;"><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_09">其他操作就类似了。 &nbsp;</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:37.4371em; left:4.0017em;"><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_09">一次请求多少性能最高？ &nbsp;</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:39.3754em; left:5.8775em;"><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_09">整个批量请求需要被加载到接受我们请求节点的内存里，所以请求越大，给其它请求可用的内存就越小。有一 &nbsp;</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:40.6259em; left:5.8775em;"><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_09">个最佳的</span><span class="stl_10 stl_08 stl_09">bulk</span><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_09">请求大小。超过这个大小，性能不再提升而且可能降低。 &nbsp;</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:41.8764em; left:5.8775em;"><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_09">最佳大小，当然并不是一个固定的数字。它完全取决于你的硬件、你文档的大小和复杂度以及索引和搜索的负 &nbsp;</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:43.127em; left:5.8775em;"><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_09">载。 &nbsp;</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:44.3775em; left:5.8775em;"><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_09">幸运的是，这个最佳点</span><span class="stl_10 stl_08 stl_09">(sweetspot)</span><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_09">还是容易找到的：试着批量索引标准的文档，随着大小的增长，当性能开始 &nbsp;</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:45.628em; left:5.8775em;"><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_09">降低，说明你每个批次的大小太大了。开始的数量可以在</span><span class="stl_10 stl_08 stl_09">1000~5000</span><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_09">个文档之间，如果你的文档非常大，可以 &nbsp;</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:46.8785em; left:5.8775em;"><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_09">使用较小的批次。 &nbsp;</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:48.129em; left:5.8775em;"><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_09">通常着眼于你请求批次的物理大小是非常有用的。一千个</span><span class="stl_10 stl_08 stl_09">1kB</span><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_09">的文档和一千个</span><span class="stl_10 stl_08 stl_09">1MB</span><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_09">的文档大不相同。一个好的 &nbsp;</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:49.3796em; left:5.8775em;"><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_09">批次最好保持在</span><span class="stl_10 stl_08 stl_09">5-15MB</span><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_09">大小间。 &nbsp;</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:51.4776em; left:4.0017em;"><span class="stl_26 stl_08 stl_09" style="font-weight:bold;">3</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:51.4776em; left:4.6976em;"><span class="stl_26 stl_08 stl_09" style="font-weight:bold;">.5</span><span class="stl_27 stl_08 stl_09" style="font-weight:bold;">、分页 &nbsp;</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:53.9439em; left:4.0017em;"><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_75" style="word-spacing:-0.0468em;">和</span><span class="stl_10 stl_08 stl_75" style="word-spacing:-0.0468em;">SQL</span><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_75" style="word-spacing:-0.0468em;">使用 </span><span class="stl_35 stl_08 stl_76" style="word-spacing:-0.052em;">LIMIT</span><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_75" style="word-spacing:-0.0468em;">关键字返回只有一页的结果一样，</span><span class="stl_10 stl_08 stl_75" style="word-spacing:-0.0468em;">Elasticsearch</span><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_75" style="word-spacing:-0.0468em;">接受 </span><span class="stl_35 stl_08 stl_76" style="word-spacing:-0.052em;">from</span><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_75" style="word-spacing:-0.0468em;">和 </span><span class="stl_35 stl_08 stl_76" style="word-spacing:-0.052em;">size</span><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_75" style="word-spacing:-0.0468em;">参数： &nbsp;</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:56.6382em; left:4.8741em;"><span class="stl_32 stl_08 stl_09">1</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:57.7637em; left:4.8741em;"><span class="stl_32 stl_08 stl_09">2</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:56.6382em; left:6.3152em;"><span class="stl_35 stl_08 stl_09" style="word-spacing:0em;">size: </span><span class="stl_42 stl_08 stl_09" style="word-spacing:0em;">结果数，默认</span><span class="stl_35 stl_08 stl_09" style="word-spacing:0em;">10 &nbsp;</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:57.7637em; left:6.3152em;"><span class="stl_35 stl_08 stl_09" style="word-spacing:0em;">from: </span><span class="stl_42 stl_08 stl_09" style="word-spacing:0em;">跳过开始的结果数，默认</span><span class="stl_35 stl_08 stl_09" style="word-spacing:0em;">0 &nbsp;</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:60.3842em; left:4.0017em;"><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_09">如果你想每页显示</span><span class="stl_10 stl_08 stl_09">5</span><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_09">个结果，页码从</span><span class="stl_10 stl_08 stl_09">1</span><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_09">到</span><span class="stl_10 stl_08 stl_09">3</span><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_09">，那请求如下： &nbsp;</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:67.063em; left:13.5417em;"><span class="stl_17 stl_18 stl_09">北京市昌平区建材城西路金燕龙办公楼一层 &nbsp;</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:67.063em; left:29.2917em;"><span class="stl_17 stl_18 stl_09">电话：400-618-9090 &nbsp;</span></div>
            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
    <div class="stl_02">
        <div class="stl_03">
            <object data="030213185197_files/img_69.svg" type="image/svg+xml" class="stl_04" style="position:absolute; width:49.5833em; height:70.0833em;">
                <embed src="030213185197_files/img_69.svg" type="image/svg+xml" class="stl_04" />
            </object>
        </div>
        <div class="view">
            <div class="stl_05 stl_06">
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:5.3669em; left:4.8741em;"><span class="stl_32 stl_08 stl_09">1</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:6.4923em; left:4.8741em;"><span class="stl_32 stl_08 stl_09">2</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:7.6177em; left:4.8741em;"><span class="stl_32 stl_08 stl_09">3</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:5.3669em; left:6.3152em;"><span class="stl_58 stl_08 stl_39" style="word-spacing:-0.0007em;">GET </span><span class="stl_41 stl_08 stl_39" style="word-spacing:-0.0007em;">/</span><span class="stl_58 stl_08 stl_39" style="word-spacing:-0.0007em;">_search</span><span class="stl_41 stl_08 stl_39" style="word-spacing:-0.0007em;">?</span><span class="stl_58 stl_08 stl_39" style="word-spacing:-0.0007em;">size</span><span class="stl_41 stl_08 stl_39" style="word-spacing:-0.0007em;">=</span><span class="stl_38 stl_08 stl_39" style="word-spacing:-0.0007em;">5 &nbsp;</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:6.4923em; left:6.3152em;"><span class="stl_58 stl_08 stl_44" style="word-spacing:-0.0006em;">GET </span><span class="stl_41 stl_08 stl_44" style="word-spacing:-0.0006em;">/</span><span class="stl_58 stl_08 stl_44" style="word-spacing:-0.0006em;">_search</span><span class="stl_41 stl_08 stl_44" style="word-spacing:-0.0006em;">?</span><span class="stl_58 stl_08 stl_44" style="word-spacing:-0.0006em;">size</span><span class="stl_41 stl_08 stl_44" style="word-spacing:-0.0006em;">=</span><span class="stl_38 stl_08 stl_44" style="word-spacing:-0.0006em;">5</span><span class="stl_41 stl_08 stl_44" style="word-spacing:-0.0006em;">&amp;</span><span class="stl_58 stl_08 stl_44" style="word-spacing:-0.0006em;">from</span><span class="stl_41 stl_08 stl_44" style="word-spacing:-0.0006em;">=</span><span class="stl_38 stl_08 stl_44" style="word-spacing:-0.0006em;">5 &nbsp;</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:7.6177em; left:6.3152em;"><span class="stl_58 stl_08 stl_44" style="word-spacing:-0.0007em;">GET </span><span class="stl_41 stl_08 stl_44" style="word-spacing:-0.0007em;">/</span><span class="stl_58 stl_08 stl_44" style="word-spacing:-0.0007em;">_search</span><span class="stl_41 stl_08 stl_44" style="word-spacing:-0.0007em;">?</span><span class="stl_58 stl_08 stl_44" style="word-spacing:-0.0007em;">size</span><span class="stl_41 stl_08 stl_44" style="word-spacing:-0.0007em;">=</span><span class="stl_38 stl_08 stl_44" style="word-spacing:-0.0007em;">5</span><span class="stl_41 stl_08 stl_44" style="word-spacing:-0.0007em;">&amp;</span><span class="stl_58 stl_08 stl_44" style="word-spacing:-0.0007em;">from</span><span class="stl_41 stl_08 stl_44" style="word-spacing:-0.0007em;">=</span><span class="stl_38 stl_08 stl_44" style="word-spacing:-0.0007em;">10 &nbsp;</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:10.2382em; left:5.1897em;"><span class="stl_50 stl_08 stl_09">应该当心分页太深或者一次请求太多的结果。结果在返回前会被排序。但是记住一个搜索请求常常涉及多个分 &nbsp;</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:11.4889em; left:5.1897em;"><span class="stl_50 stl_08 stl_09">片。每个分片生成自己排好序的结果，它们接着需要集中起来排序以确保整体排序正确。 &nbsp;</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:14.1204em; left:4.8741em;"><span class="stl_32 stl_08 stl_09">1</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:14.1204em; left:6.3152em;"><span class="stl_46 stl_08 stl_09" style="word-spacing:-0.001em;">GET </span><span class="stl_73 stl_08 stl_09" style="word-spacing:-0.001em;">/haoke/user/_search?size=1&amp;from=2 &nbsp;</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:54.5069em; left:4.0017em;"><span class="stl_10 stl_08 stl_09">ꢀ</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:56.4452em; left:5.1897em;"><span class="stl_55 stl_08 stl_09" style="font-weight:bold;">在集群系统中深度分页 &nbsp;</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:58.321em; left:5.1897em;"><span class="stl_50 stl_08 stl_09">为了理解为什么深度分页是有问题的，让我们假设在一个有</span><span class="stl_52 stl_08 stl_09">5</span><span class="stl_50 stl_08 stl_09">个主分片的索引中搜索。当我们请求结果的第一 &nbsp;</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:59.5715em; left:5.1897em;"><span class="stl_50 stl_08 stl_56" style="word-spacing:0.0008em;">页（结果</span><span class="stl_52 stl_08 stl_56" style="word-spacing:0.0008em;">1</span><span class="stl_50 stl_08 stl_56" style="word-spacing:0.0008em;">到</span><span class="stl_52 stl_08 stl_56" style="word-spacing:0.0008em;">10</span><span class="stl_50 stl_08 stl_56" style="word-spacing:0.0008em;">）时，每个分片产生自己最顶端</span><span class="stl_52 stl_08 stl_56" style="word-spacing:0.0008em;">10</span><span class="stl_50 stl_08 stl_56" style="word-spacing:0.0008em;">个结果然后返回它们给</span><span class="stl_55 stl_08 stl_56" style="font-weight:bold; word-spacing:0.0008em;">请求节点</span><span class="stl_19 stl_08 stl_56" style="font-weight:bold; word-spacing:0.0008em;">(requesting node)</span><span class="stl_50 stl_08 stl_56" style="word-spacing:0.0008em;">，它再 &nbsp;</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:60.822em; left:5.1897em;"><span class="stl_50 stl_08 stl_09">排序这所有的</span><span class="stl_52 stl_08 stl_09">50</span><span class="stl_50 stl_08 stl_09">个结果以选出顶端的</span><span class="stl_52 stl_08 stl_09">10</span><span class="stl_50 stl_08 stl_09">个结果。 &nbsp;</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:62.7603em; left:5.1897em;"><span class="stl_50 stl_08 stl_09">现在假设我们请求第</span><span class="stl_52 stl_08 stl_09">1000</span><span class="stl_50 stl_08 stl_09">页</span><span class="stl_52 stl_08 stl_09">——</span><span class="stl_50 stl_08 stl_09">结果</span><span class="stl_52 stl_08 stl_09">10001</span><span class="stl_50 stl_08 stl_09">到</span><span class="stl_52 stl_08 stl_09">10010</span><span class="stl_50 stl_08 stl_09">。工作方式都相同，不同的是每个分片都必须产生顶端的 &nbsp;</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:64.0108em; left:5.1897em;"><span class="stl_52 stl_08 stl_09">1</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:64.0108em; left:5.6544em;"><span class="stl_52 stl_08 stl_09">0010</span><span class="stl_50 stl_08 stl_09">个结果。然后请求节点排序这</span><span class="stl_52 stl_08 stl_09">50050</span><span class="stl_50 stl_08 stl_09">个结果并丢弃</span><span class="stl_52 stl_08 stl_09">50040</span><span class="stl_50 stl_08 stl_09">个！ &nbsp;</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:67.063em; left:13.5417em;"><span class="stl_17 stl_18 stl_09">北京市昌平区建材城西路金燕龙办公楼一层 &nbsp;</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:67.063em; left:29.2917em;"><span class="stl_17 stl_18 stl_09">电话：400-618-9090 &nbsp;</span></div>
            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
    <div class="stl_02">
        <div class="stl_03">
            <object data="030213185197_files/img_70.svg" type="image/svg+xml" class="stl_04" style="position:absolute; width:49.5833em; height:70.0833em;">
                <embed src="030213185197_files/img_70.svg" type="image/svg+xml" class="stl_04" />
            </object>
        </div>
        <div class="view">
            <div class="stl_05 stl_06">
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:4.9234em; left:5.1897em;"><span class="stl_50 stl_08 stl_09">你可以看到在分布式系统中，排序结果的花费随着分页的深入而成倍增长。这也是为什么网络搜索引擎中任何 &nbsp;</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:6.1741em; left:5.1897em;"><span class="stl_50 stl_08 stl_09">语句不能返回多于</span><span class="stl_52 stl_08 stl_09">1000</span><span class="stl_50 stl_08 stl_09">个结果的原因。 &nbsp;</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:8.272em; left:4.0017em;"><span class="stl_26 stl_08 stl_09" style="font-weight:bold;">3</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:8.272em; left:4.6976em;"><span class="stl_26 stl_08 stl_09" style="font-weight:bold;">.6</span><span class="stl_27 stl_08 stl_09" style="font-weight:bold;">、映射 &nbsp;</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:10.7384em; left:4.0017em;"><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_56">前面我们创建的索引以及插入数据，都是由</span><span class="stl_10 stl_08 stl_56">Elasticsearch</span><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_56">进行自动判断类型，有些时候我们是需要进行明确字段类型 &nbsp;</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:11.989em; left:4.0017em;"><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_09">的，否则，自动判断的类型和实际需求是不相符的。 &nbsp;</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:13.8647em; left:4.0017em;"><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_09">自动判断的规则如下： &nbsp;</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:16.5533em; left:4.877em;"><span class="stl_59 stl_08 stl_09" style="font-weight:bold; word-spacing:0em;">JSON type &nbsp;</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:16.5533em; left:33.6391em;"><span class="stl_59 stl_08 stl_09" style="font-weight:bold; word-spacing:0em;">Field type &nbsp;</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:18.6849em; left:33.8267em;"><span class="stl_35 stl_08 stl_09">"boolean" &nbsp;</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:20.8107em; left:33.8267em;"><span class="stl_35 stl_08 stl_09">"long" &nbsp;</span></div>

                <div class="stl_01" style="top:22.8686em; left:4.877em;"><span class="stl_10 stl_08 stl_09" style="word-spacing:0em;">Floating point:</span><span class="stl_35 stl_08 stl_09" style="word-spacing:0.2557em;"> 123.45 &nbsp;</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:24.9944em; left:4.877em;"><span class="stl_10 stl_08 stl_44" style="word-spacing:0.0003em;">String, valid date:</span><span class="stl_35 stl_08 stl_44" style="word-spacing:0.2555em;"> "2014</span><span class="stl_77 stl_08 stl_44" style="word-spacing:0.2555em;">-</span><span class="stl_35 stl_08 stl_44" style="word-spacing:0.2555em;">09</span><span class="stl_77 stl_08 stl_44" style="word-spacing:0.2555em;">-</span><span class="stl_35 stl_08 stl_44" style="word-spacing:0.2555em;">15" &nbsp;</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:27.1204em; left:4.877em;"><span class="stl_10 stl_08 stl_09" style="word-spacing:0.2303em;">String: </span><span class="stl_35 stl_08 stl_09" style="word-spacing:0.2559em;">"foo</span><span class="stl_35 stl_08 stl_09" style="word-spacing:0em;"> bar" &nbsp;</span></div>

                <div class="stl_01" style="top:29.8715em; left:4.0017em;"><span class="stl_10 stl_08 stl_22">Elasticsearch</span><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_22">中支持的类型如下： &nbsp;</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:32.4976em; left:4.877em;"><span class="stl_60 stl_08 stl_09" style="font-weight:bold;">类型 &nbsp;</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:32.4976em; left:19.6958em;"><span class="stl_60 stl_08 stl_09" style="font-weight:bold;">表示的数据类型 &nbsp;</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:34.561em; left:19.8834em;"><span class="stl_35 stl_08 stl_78" style="word-spacing:-0.0974em;">string</span><span class="stl_10 stl_08 stl_79" style="word-spacing:-0.0877em;">, </span><span class="stl_35 stl_08 stl_78" style="word-spacing:-0.0974em;">text</span><span class="stl_10 stl_08 stl_79" style="word-spacing:-0.0877em;">, </span><span class="stl_35 stl_08 stl_78" style="word-spacing:-0.0974em;">keyword &nbsp;</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:36.6868em; left:19.8834em;"><span class="stl_35 stl_08 stl_80" style="word-spacing:0.1756em;">byte</span><span class="stl_10 stl_08 stl_81" style="word-spacing:0.1581em;">, </span><span class="stl_35 stl_08 stl_80" style="word-spacing:0.1756em;">short</span><span class="stl_10 stl_08 stl_81" style="word-spacing:0.1581em;">, </span><span class="stl_35 stl_08 stl_80" style="word-spacing:0.1756em;">integer</span><span class="stl_10 stl_08 stl_81" style="word-spacing:0.1581em;">, </span><span class="stl_35 stl_08 stl_80" style="word-spacing:0.1756em;">long &nbsp;</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:38.8127em; left:19.8834em;"><span class="stl_35 stl_08 stl_82" style="word-spacing:0.2053em;">float</span><span class="stl_10 stl_08 stl_83" style="word-spacing:0.1848em;">, </span><span class="stl_35 stl_08 stl_82" style="word-spacing:0.2053em;">double &nbsp;</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:41.0067em; left:19.8834em;"><span class="stl_35 stl_08 stl_09">boolean &nbsp;</span></div>

                <div class="stl_01" style="top:38.8127em; left:4.877em;"><span class="stl_10 stl_08 stl_09" style="word-spacing:0em;">Floating point &nbsp;</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:40.9386em; left:4.877em;"><span class="stl_10 stl_08 stl_09">Boolean &nbsp;</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:43.0645em; left:4.877em;"><span class="stl_10 stl_08 stl_09">Date &nbsp;</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:43.1326em; left:19.8834em;"><span class="stl_35 stl_08 stl_09">date &nbsp;</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:45.8157em; left:7.0655em;"><span class="stl_52 stl_08 stl_47" style="word-spacing:0.0019em;">string</span><span class="stl_50 stl_08 stl_47" style="word-spacing:0.0019em;">类型在</span><span class="stl_52 stl_08 stl_47" style="word-spacing:0.0019em;">ElasticSearch </span><span class="stl_50 stl_08 stl_47" style="word-spacing:0.0019em;">旧版本中使用较多，从</span><span class="stl_52 stl_08 stl_47" style="word-spacing:0.0019em;">ElasticSearch 5.x</span><span class="stl_50 stl_08 stl_47" style="word-spacing:0.0019em;">开始不再支持</span><span class="stl_52 stl_08 stl_47" style="word-spacing:0.0019em;">string</span><span class="stl_50 stl_08 stl_47" style="word-spacing:0.0019em;">，由</span><span class="stl_52 stl_08 stl_47" style="word-spacing:0.0019em;">text</span><span class="stl_50 stl_08 stl_47" style="word-spacing:0.0019em;">和 &nbsp;</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:47.0662em; left:7.0655em;"><span class="stl_52 stl_08 stl_84">keyword</span><span class="stl_50 stl_08 stl_84">类型替代。 &nbsp;</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:48.3167em; left:7.0655em;"><span class="stl_52 stl_08 stl_12" style="word-spacing:0.0023em;">text </span><span class="stl_50 stl_08 stl_12" style="word-spacing:0.0023em;">类型，当一个字段是要被全文搜索的，比如</span><span class="stl_52 stl_08 stl_12" style="word-spacing:0.0023em;">Email</span><span class="stl_50 stl_08 stl_12" style="word-spacing:0.0023em;">内容、产品描述，应该使用</span><span class="stl_52 stl_08 stl_12" style="word-spacing:0.0023em;">text</span><span class="stl_50 stl_08 stl_12" style="word-spacing:0.0023em;">类型。设置</span><span class="stl_52 stl_08 stl_12" style="word-spacing:0.0023em;">text</span><span class="stl_50 stl_08 stl_12" style="word-spacing:0.0023em;">类型 &nbsp;</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:49.5673em; left:7.0655em;"><span class="stl_50 stl_08 stl_56">以后，字段内容会被分析，在生成倒排索引以前，字符串会被分析器分成一个一个词项。</span><span class="stl_52 stl_08 stl_56">text</span><span class="stl_50 stl_08 stl_56">类型的字段 &nbsp;</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:50.8178em; left:7.0655em;"><span class="stl_50 stl_08 stl_09">不用于排序，很少用于聚合。 &nbsp;</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:52.0683em; left:7.0655em;"><span class="stl_52 stl_08 stl_13">keyword</span><span class="stl_50 stl_08 stl_13">类型适用于索引结构化的字段，比如</span><span class="stl_52 stl_08 stl_13">email</span><span class="stl_50 stl_08 stl_13">地址、主机名、状态码和标签。如果字段需要进行过 &nbsp;</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:53.3188em; left:7.0655em;"><span class="stl_50 stl_08 stl_12">滤</span><span class="stl_52 stl_08 stl_12">(</span><span class="stl_50 stl_08 stl_12">比如查找已发布博客中</span><span class="stl_52 stl_08 stl_12">status</span><span class="stl_50 stl_08 stl_12">属性为</span><span class="stl_52 stl_08 stl_12">published</span><span class="stl_50 stl_08 stl_12">的文章</span><span class="stl_52 stl_08 stl_12">)</span><span class="stl_50 stl_08 stl_12">、排序、聚合。</span><span class="stl_52 stl_08 stl_12">keyword</span><span class="stl_50 stl_08 stl_12">类型的字段只能通过精 &nbsp;</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:54.5694em; left:7.0655em;"><span class="stl_50 stl_08 stl_09">确值搜索到。 &nbsp;</span></div>

                <div class="stl_01" style="top:36.8466em; left:4.6976em;"><span class="stl_26 stl_08 stl_09" style="font-weight:bold;">.8</span><span class="stl_27 stl_08 stl_09" style="font-weight:bold;">、过滤查询 &nbsp;</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:39.3129em; left:4.0017em;"><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_25">前面讲过结构化查询，</span><span class="stl_10 stl_08 stl_25">Elasticsearch</span><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_25">也支持过滤查询，如</span><span class="stl_10 stl_08 stl_25">term</span><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_25">、</span><span class="stl_10 stl_08 stl_25">range</span><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_25">、</span><span class="stl_10 stl_08 stl_25">match</span><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_25">等。 &nbsp;</span></div>

                <div class="stl_01" style="top:47.1969em; left:7.2562em;"><span class="stl_35 stl_08 stl_39" style="word-spacing:0.0002em;">ꢀ ꢀ ꢀ ꢀ</span><span class="stl_43 stl_08 stl_39" style="word-spacing:0.0002em;">"bool"</span><span class="stl_35 stl_08 stl_39" style="word-spacing:0.0002em;">: { &nbsp;</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:48.3224em; left:7.2562em;"><span class="stl_35 stl_08 stl_39" style="word-spacing:0.0002em;">ꢀ ꢀ ꢀ ꢀ ꢀ ꢀ</span><span class="stl_43 stl_08 stl_39" style="word-spacing:0.0002em;">"filter"</span><span class="stl_35 stl_08 stl_39" style="word-spacing:0.0002em;">: { &nbsp;</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:49.4477em; left:7.2562em;"><span class="stl_35 stl_08 stl_44" style="word-spacing:0.0004em;">ꢀ ꢀ ꢀ ꢀ ꢀ ꢀ ꢀ ꢀ</span><span class="stl_43 stl_08 stl_44" style="word-spacing:0.0004em;">"term"</span><span class="stl_35 stl_08 stl_44" style="word-spacing:0.0004em;">: { &nbsp;</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:50.5732em; left:7.2562em;"><span class="stl_35 stl_08 stl_16" style="word-spacing:0.0005em;">ꢀ ꢀ ꢀ ꢀ ꢀ ꢀ ꢀ ꢀ ꢀ ꢀ</span><span class="stl_43 stl_08 stl_16" style="word-spacing:0.0005em;">"age"</span><span class="stl_35 stl_08 stl_16" style="word-spacing:0.0005em;">: </span><span class="stl_38 stl_08 stl_16" style="word-spacing:0.0005em;">20 &nbsp;</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:51.6987em; left:7.2562em;"><span class="stl_35 stl_08 stl_09" style="word-spacing:0em;">ꢀ ꢀ</span><span class="stl_35 stl_08 stl_09" style="word-spacing:0em;"> ꢀ</span><span class="stl_35 stl_08 stl_09" style="word-spacing:0em;"> ꢀ</span><span class="stl_35 stl_08 stl_09" style="word-spacing:0em;"> ꢀ</span><span class="stl_35 stl_08 stl_09" style="word-spacing:0em;"> ꢀ</span><span class="stl_35 stl_08 stl_09" style="word-spacing:0em;"> ꢀ</span><span class="stl_35 stl_08 stl_09" style="word-spacing:0em;"> } &nbsp;</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:52.8242em; left:7.2562em;"><span class="stl_35 stl_08 stl_09" style="word-spacing:0em;">ꢀ ꢀ</span><span class="stl_35 stl_08 stl_09" style="word-spacing:0em;"> ꢀ</span><span class="stl_35 stl_08 stl_09" style="word-spacing:0em;"> ꢀ</span><span class="stl_35 stl_08 stl_09" style="word-spacing:0em;"> ꢀ</span><span class="stl_35 stl_08 stl_09" style="word-spacing:0em;"> } &nbsp;</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:53.9497em; left:4.9337em;"><span class="stl_32 stl_08 stl_09">1</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:55.0752em; left:4.9337em;"><span class="stl_32 stl_08 stl_09">1</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:56.2007em; left:4.9337em;"><span class="stl_32 stl_08 stl_09">1</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:53.9497em; left:7.2562em;"><span class="stl_35 stl_08 stl_09" style="word-spacing:0em;">ꢀ ꢀ</span><span class="stl_35 stl_08 stl_09" style="word-spacing:0em;"> ꢀ</span><span class="stl_35 stl_08 stl_09" style="word-spacing:0em;"> } &nbsp;</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:55.0752em; left:7.2562em;"><span class="stl_35 stl_08 stl_09" style="word-spacing:0.6025em;">ꢀ } &nbsp;</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:56.2007em; left:5.3745em;"><span class="stl_32 stl_08 stl_09" style="word-spacing:0.7645em;">2 </span><span class="stl_35 stl_08 stl_09" style="word-spacing:0.7645em;">} &nbsp;</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:58.8212em; left:4.0017em;"><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_09">结果： &nbsp;</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:67.063em; left:13.5417em;"><span class="stl_17 stl_18 stl_09">北京市昌平区建材城西路金燕龙办公楼一层 &nbsp;</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:67.063em; left:29.2917em;"><span class="stl_17 stl_18 stl_09">电话：400-618-9090 &nbsp;</span></div>
