    <div class="stl_02">
        <div class="stl_03">
            <object data="030213185197_files/img_89.svg" type="image/svg+xml" class="stl_04" style="position:absolute; width:49.5833em; height:70.0833em;">
                <embed src="030213185197_files/img_89.svg" type="image/svg+xml" class="stl_04" />
            </object>
        </div>
        <div class="view">
            <div class="stl_05 stl_06">
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:42.7519em; left:5.1897em;"><span class="stl_50 stl_08 stl_09">查询和过滤的对比 &nbsp;</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:44.6902em; left:5.8775em;"><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_09">一条过滤语句会询问每个文档的字段值是否包含着特定值。 &nbsp;</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:46.3158em; left:5.8775em;"><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_09">查询语句会询问每个文档的字段值与特定值的匹配程度如何。 &nbsp;</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:48.0042em; left:7.7533em;"><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_56" style="word-spacing:0.0106em;">一条查询语句会计算每个文档与查询语句的相关性，会给出一个相关性评分 </span><span class="stl_10 stl_08 stl_56" style="word-spacing:0.0106em;">_score</span><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_56" style="word-spacing:0.0106em;">，并且 按照相关性对匹 &nbsp;</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:49.2546em; left:7.7533em;"><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_09" style="word-spacing:0.0098em;">配到的文档进行排序。 这种评分方式非常适用于一个没有完全配置结果的全文本搜索。 &nbsp;</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:50.5051em; left:5.8775em;"><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_09" style="word-spacing:0.0098em;">一个简单的文档列表，快速匹配运算并存入内存是十分方便的， 每个文档仅需要</span><span class="stl_10 stl_08 stl_09" style="word-spacing:0.0098em;">1</span><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_09" style="word-spacing:0.0098em;">个字节。这些缓存的过滤结果 &nbsp;</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:51.7556em; left:5.8775em;"><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_09">集与后续请求的结合使用是非常高效的。 &nbsp;</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:53.3813em; left:5.8775em;"><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_09" style="word-spacing:0.0098em;">查询语句不仅要查找相匹配的文档，还需要计算每个文档的相关性，所以一般来说查询语句要比 过滤语句更耗 &nbsp;</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:54.6319em; left:5.8775em;"><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_09">时，并且查询结果也不可缓存。 &nbsp;</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:56.5702em; left:5.1897em;"><span class="stl_50 stl_08 stl_09">建议： &nbsp;</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:58.446em; left:5.1897em;"><span class="stl_50 stl_08 stl_09">做精确匹配搜索时，最好用过滤语句，因为过滤语句可以缓存数据。 &nbsp;</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:60.4362em; left:4.0017em;"><span class="stl_15 stl_08 stl_09" style="font-weight:bold;">4</span><span class="stl_07 stl_08 stl_09" style="font-weight:bold;">、中文分词 &nbsp;</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:63.5451em; left:4.0017em;"><span class="stl_26 stl_08 stl_09" style="font-weight:bold;">4</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:63.5451em; left:4.6976em;"><span class="stl_26 stl_08 stl_09" style="font-weight:bold;">.1</span><span class="stl_27 stl_08 stl_09" style="font-weight:bold;">、什么是分词 &nbsp;</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:67.063em; left:13.5417em;"><span class="stl_17 stl_18 stl_09">北京市昌平区建材城西路金燕龙办公楼一层 &nbsp;</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:67.063em; left:29.2917em;"><span class="stl_17 stl_18 stl_09">电话：400-618-9090 &nbsp;</span></div>
            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
    <div class="stl_02">
        <div class="stl_03">
            <object data="030213185197_files/img_91.svg" type="image/svg+xml" class="stl_04" style="position:absolute; width:49.5833em; height:70.0833em;">
                <embed src="030213185197_files/img_91.svg" type="image/svg+xml" class="stl_04" />
            </object>
        </div>
        <div class="view">
            <div class="stl_05 stl_06">
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:4.9237em; left:4.0017em;"><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_56">分词就是指将一个文本转化成一系列单词的过程，也叫文本分析，在</span><span class="stl_10 stl_08 stl_56">Elasticsearch</span><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_56">中称之为</span><span class="stl_10 stl_08 stl_56">Analysis</span><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_56">。 &nbsp;</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:6.7994em; left:4.0017em;"><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_09" style="word-spacing:0.0046em;">举例：我是中国人 </span><span class="stl_10 stl_08 stl_09" style="word-spacing:0.0046em;">--&gt; </span><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_09" style="word-spacing:0.0046em;">我</span><span class="stl_10 stl_08 stl_09" style="word-spacing:0.0046em;">/</span><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_09" style="word-spacing:0.0046em;">是</span><span class="stl_10 stl_08 stl_09" style="word-spacing:0.0046em;">/</span><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_09" style="word-spacing:0.0046em;">中国人 &nbsp;</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:8.8973em; left:4.0017em;"><span class="stl_26 stl_08 stl_09" style="font-weight:bold;">4</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:8.8973em; left:4.6976em;"><span class="stl_26 stl_08 stl_09" style="font-weight:bold;">.2</span><span class="stl_27 stl_08 stl_09" style="font-weight:bold;">、分词</span><span class="stl_26 stl_08 stl_09" style="font-weight:bold;">api &nbsp;</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:11.3639em; left:5.1897em;"><span class="stl_50 stl_08 stl_09">指定分词器进行分词 &nbsp;</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:13.9954em; left:4.8741em;"><span class="stl_32 stl_08 stl_09">1</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:15.1211em; left:4.8741em;"><span class="stl_32 stl_08 stl_09">2</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:16.2464em; left:4.8741em;"><span class="stl_32 stl_08 stl_09">3</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:17.3721em; left:4.8741em;"><span class="stl_32 stl_08 stl_09">4</span></div>

            <div class="stl_05 stl_06">
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:39.2225em; left:4.0017em;"><span class="stl_26 stl_08 stl_09" style="font-weight:bold;">4</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:39.2225em; left:4.6976em;"><span class="stl_26 stl_08 stl_09" style="font-weight:bold;">.4</span><span class="stl_27 stl_08 stl_09" style="font-weight:bold;">、中文分词 &nbsp;</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:41.6887em; left:4.0017em;"><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_09">中文分词的难点在于，在汉语中没有明显的词汇分界点，如在英语中，空格可以作为分隔符，如果分隔不正确就会造 &nbsp;</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:42.9394em; left:4.0017em;"><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_09">成歧义。 &nbsp;</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:44.815em; left:4.0017em;"><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_09">如： &nbsp;</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:46.7535em; left:4.0017em;"><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_09">我</span><span class="stl_10 stl_08 stl_09">/</span><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_09">爱</span><span class="stl_10 stl_08 stl_09">/</span><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_09">炒肉丝 &nbsp;</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:48.6292em; left:4.0017em;"><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_09">我</span><span class="stl_10 stl_08 stl_09">/</span><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_09">爱</span><span class="stl_10 stl_08 stl_09">/</span><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_09">炒</span><span class="stl_10 stl_08 stl_09">/</span><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_09">肉丝 &nbsp;</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:50.5676em; left:4.0017em;"><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_23">常用中文分词器，</span><span class="stl_10 stl_08 stl_23">IK</span><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_23">、</span><span class="stl_10 stl_08 stl_23">jieba</span><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_23">、</span><span class="stl_10 stl_08 stl_23">THULAC</span><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_23">等，推荐使用</span><span class="stl_10 stl_08 stl_23">IK</span><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_23">分词器。 &nbsp;</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:52.4433em; left:5.1897em;"><span class="stl_52 stl_08 stl_09" style="word-spacing:0em;">IK Analyzer</span><span class="stl_50 stl_08 stl_09" style="word-spacing:0em;">是一个开源的，基于</span><span class="stl_52 stl_08 stl_09" style="word-spacing:0em;">java</span><span class="stl_50 stl_08 stl_09" style="word-spacing:0em;">语言开发的轻量级的中文分词工具包。从</span><span class="stl_52 stl_08 stl_09" style="word-spacing:0em;">2006</span><span class="stl_50 stl_08 stl_09" style="word-spacing:0em;">年</span><span class="stl_52 stl_08 stl_09" style="word-spacing:0em;">12</span><span class="stl_50 stl_08 stl_09" style="word-spacing:0em;">月推出</span><span class="stl_52 stl_08 stl_09" style="word-spacing:0em;">1.0</span><span class="stl_50 stl_08 stl_09" style="word-spacing:0em;">版开始， &nbsp;</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:53.6939em; left:5.1897em;"><span class="stl_52 stl_08 stl_09">IKAnalyzer</span><span class="stl_50 stl_08 stl_09">已经推出了</span><span class="stl_52 stl_08 stl_09">3</span><span class="stl_50 stl_08 stl_09">个大版本。最初，它是以开源项目</span><span class="stl_52 stl_08 stl_09">Luence</span><span class="stl_50 stl_08 stl_09">为应用主体的，结合词典分词和文法分析算 &nbsp;</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:54.9443em; left:5.1897em;"><span class="stl_50 stl_08 stl_09" style="word-spacing:0em;">法的中文分词组件。新版本的</span><span class="stl_52 stl_08 stl_09" style="word-spacing:0em;">IK Analyzer 3.0</span><span class="stl_50 stl_08 stl_09" style="word-spacing:0em;">则发展为面向</span><span class="stl_52 stl_08 stl_09" style="word-spacing:0em;">Java</span><span class="stl_50 stl_08 stl_09" style="word-spacing:0em;">的公用分词组件，独立于</span><span class="stl_52 stl_08 stl_09" style="word-spacing:0em;">Lucene</span><span class="stl_50 stl_08 stl_09" style="word-spacing:0em;">项目，同时提 &nbsp;</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:56.1949em; left:5.1897em;"><span class="stl_50 stl_08 stl_09">供了对</span><span class="stl_52 stl_08 stl_09">Lucene</span><span class="stl_50 stl_08 stl_09">的默认优化实现。 &nbsp;</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:58.0709em; left:5.1897em;"><span class="stl_50 stl_08 stl_09" style="word-spacing:0.0098em;">采用了特有的</span><span class="stl_52 stl_08 stl_09" style="word-spacing:0.0098em;">“</span><span class="stl_50 stl_08 stl_09" style="word-spacing:0.0098em;">正向迭代最细粒度切分算法</span><span class="stl_52 stl_08 stl_09" style="word-spacing:0.0098em;">“</span><span class="stl_50 stl_08 stl_09" style="word-spacing:0.0098em;">，具有</span><span class="stl_52 stl_08 stl_09" style="word-spacing:0.0098em;">80</span><span class="stl_50 stl_08 stl_09" style="word-spacing:0.0098em;">万字</span><span class="stl_52 stl_08 stl_09" style="word-spacing:0.0098em;">/</span><span class="stl_50 stl_08 stl_09" style="word-spacing:0.0098em;">秒的高速处理能力 采用了多子处理器分析模式，支 &nbsp;</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:59.3212em; left:5.1897em;"><span class="stl_50 stl_08 stl_09">持：英文字母（</span><span class="stl_52 stl_08 stl_09">IP</span><span class="stl_50 stl_08 stl_09">地址、</span><span class="stl_52 stl_08 stl_09">Email</span><span class="stl_50 stl_08 stl_09">、</span><span class="stl_52 stl_08 stl_09">URL</span><span class="stl_50 stl_08 stl_09">）、数字（日期，常用中文数量词，罗马数字，科学计数法），中文词汇 &nbsp;</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:60.5719em; left:5.1897em;"><span class="stl_50 stl_08 stl_09">（</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:60.5719em; left:6.0025em;"><span class="stl_50 stl_08 stl_09" style="word-spacing:0.0098em;">姓名、地名处理）等分词处理。 优化的词典存储，更小的内存占用。 &nbsp;</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:62.51em; left:4.0017em;"><span class="stl_10 stl_08 stl_23" style="word-spacing:0.0109em;">IK</span><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_23" style="word-spacing:0.0109em;">分词器 </span><span class="stl_10 stl_08 stl_23" style="word-spacing:0.0109em;">Elasticsearch</span><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_23" style="word-spacing:0.0109em;">插件地址：</span><a href="https://github.com/medcl/elasticsearch-analysis-ik" target="_blank"><span class="stl_29 stl_08 stl_23" style="word-spacing:0.0109em;">https://github.com/medcl/elasticsearch-analysis-ik &nbsp;</span></a></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:67.063em; left:13.5417em;"><span class="stl_17 stl_18 stl_09">北京市昌平区建材城西路金燕龙办公楼一层 &nbsp;</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:67.063em; left:29.2917em;"><span class="stl_17 stl_18 stl_09">电话：400-618-9090 &nbsp;</span></div>
            </div>

                <div class="stl_01" style="top:43.8775em; left:5.1897em;"><span class="stl_55 stl_08 stl_09" style="font-weight:bold;">评分的计算规则 &nbsp;</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:45.8157em; left:5.1897em;"><span class="stl_52 stl_08 stl_47" style="word-spacing:0.0066em;">bool </span><span class="stl_50 stl_08 stl_47" style="word-spacing:0.0066em;">查询会为每个文档计算相关度评分 </span><span class="stl_52 stl_08 stl_47" style="word-spacing:0.0066em;">_score </span><span class="stl_50 stl_08 stl_47" style="word-spacing:0.0066em;">， 再将所有匹配的 </span><span class="stl_52 stl_08 stl_47" style="word-spacing:0.0066em;">must </span><span class="stl_50 stl_08 stl_47" style="word-spacing:0.0066em;">和 </span><span class="stl_52 stl_08 stl_47" style="word-spacing:0.0066em;">should </span><span class="stl_50 stl_08 stl_47" style="word-spacing:0.0066em;">语句的分数 </span><span class="stl_52 stl_08 stl_47" style="word-spacing:0.0066em;">_score </span><span class="stl_50 stl_08 stl_47" style="word-spacing:0.0066em;">求和， &nbsp;</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:47.0663em; left:5.1897em;"><span class="stl_50 stl_08 stl_09" style="word-spacing:0.0049em;">最后除以 </span><span class="stl_52 stl_08 stl_09" style="word-spacing:0.0049em;">must </span><span class="stl_50 stl_08 stl_09" style="word-spacing:0.0049em;">和 </span><span class="stl_52 stl_08 stl_09" style="word-spacing:0.0049em;">should </span><span class="stl_50 stl_08 stl_09" style="word-spacing:0.0049em;">语句的总数。 &nbsp;</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:48.942em; left:5.1897em;"><span class="stl_52 stl_08 stl_09" style="word-spacing:0.0049em;">must_not </span><span class="stl_50 stl_08 stl_09" style="word-spacing:0.0049em;">语句不会影响评分； 它的作用只是将不相关的文档排除。 &nbsp;</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:50.818em; left:4.0017em;"><span class="stl_10 stl_08 stl_09">ꢀ</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:52.7561em; left:4.0017em;"><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_09">默认情况下，</span><span class="stl_10 stl_08 stl_09">should</span><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_09">中的内容不是必须匹配的，如果查询语句中没有</span><span class="stl_10 stl_08 stl_09">must</span><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_09">，那么就会至少匹配其中一个。当然了， &nbsp;</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:54.0068em; left:4.0017em;"><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_09">也可以通过</span><span class="stl_10 stl_08 stl_09">minimum_should_match</span><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_09">参数进行控制，该值可以是数字也可以的百分比。 &nbsp;</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:55.8824em; left:4.0017em;"><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_09">示例： &nbsp;</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:58.5143em; left:5.3743em;"><span class="stl_32 stl_08 stl_09">1</span></div>

        <div class="view">
            <div class="stl_05 stl_06">
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:42.9914em; left:4.0017em;"><span class="stl_15 stl_08 stl_49" style="font-weight:bold;">6</span><span class="stl_07 stl_08 stl_49" style="font-weight:bold;">、</span><span class="stl_15 stl_08 stl_49" style="font-weight:bold;">Elasticsearch</span><span class="stl_07 stl_08 stl_49" style="font-weight:bold;">集群 &nbsp;</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:46.038em; left:4.0017em;"><span class="stl_26 stl_08 stl_09" style="font-weight:bold;">6</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:46.038em; left:4.6976em;"><span class="stl_26 stl_08 stl_09" style="font-weight:bold;">.1</span><span class="stl_27 stl_08 stl_09" style="font-weight:bold;">、集群节点 &nbsp;</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:48.5045em; left:4.0017em;"><span class="stl_10 stl_08 stl_16">ELasticsearch</span><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_16">的集群是由多个节点组成的，通过</span><span class="stl_10 stl_08 stl_16">cluster.name</span><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_16">设置集群名称，并且用于区分其它的集群，每个节点 &nbsp;</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:49.7548em; left:4.0017em;"><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_09">通过</span><span class="stl_10 stl_08 stl_09">node.name</span><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_09">指定节点的名称。 &nbsp;</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:51.6933em; left:4.0017em;"><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_25">在</span><span class="stl_10 stl_08 stl_25">Elasticsearch</span><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_25">中，节点的类型主要有</span><span class="stl_10 stl_08 stl_25">4</span><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_25">种： &nbsp;</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:53.5689em; left:5.8775em;"><span class="stl_10 stl_08 stl_09">master</span><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_09">节点 &nbsp;</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:55.2571em; left:7.7533em;"><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_09">配置文件中</span><span class="stl_10 stl_08 stl_09">node.master</span><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_09">属性为</span><span class="stl_10 stl_08 stl_09">true(</span><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_09">默认为</span><span class="stl_10 stl_08 stl_09">true)</span><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_09">，就有资格被选为</span><span class="stl_10 stl_08 stl_09">master</span><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_09">节点。 &nbsp;</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:56.5077em; left:7.7533em;"><span class="stl_10 stl_08 stl_09">master</span><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_09">节点用于控制整个集群的操作。比如创建或删除索引，管理其它非</span><span class="stl_10 stl_08 stl_09">master</span><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_09">节点等。 &nbsp;</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:57.7584em; left:5.8775em;"><span class="stl_10 stl_08 stl_09">data</span><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_09">节点 &nbsp;</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:59.384em; left:7.7533em;"><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_09">配置文件中</span><span class="stl_10 stl_08 stl_09">node.data</span><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_09">属性为</span><span class="stl_10 stl_08 stl_09">true(</span><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_09">默认为</span><span class="stl_10 stl_08 stl_09">true)</span><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_09">，就有资格被设置成</span><span class="stl_10 stl_08 stl_09">data</span><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_09">节点。 &nbsp;</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:60.6344em; left:7.7533em;"><span class="stl_10 stl_08 stl_09">data</span><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_09">节点主要用于执行数据相关的操作。比如文档的</span><span class="stl_10 stl_08 stl_09">CRUD</span><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_09">。 &nbsp;</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:61.885em; left:5.8775em;"><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_09">客户端节点 &nbsp;</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:63.5732em; left:7.7533em;"><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_09">配置文件中</span><span class="stl_10 stl_08 stl_09">node.master</span><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_09">属性和</span><span class="stl_10 stl_08 stl_09">node.data</span><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_09">属性均为</span><span class="stl_10 stl_08 stl_09">false</span><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_09">。 &nbsp;</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:67.063em; left:13.5417em;"><span class="stl_17 stl_18 stl_09">北京市昌平区建材城西路金燕龙办公楼一层 &nbsp;</span></div>

                <div class="stl_01" style="top:4.9234em; left:7.7533em;"><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_09">该节点不能作为</span><span class="stl_10 stl_08 stl_09">master</span><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_09">节点，也不能作为</span><span class="stl_10 stl_08 stl_09">data</span><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_09">节点。 &nbsp;</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:6.1737em; left:7.7533em;"><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_09">可以作为客户端节点，用于响应用户的请求，把请求转发到其他节点 &nbsp;</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:7.4244em; left:5.8775em;"><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_09">部落节点 &nbsp;</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:9.1125em; left:7.7533em;"><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_09">当一个节点配置</span><span class="stl_10 stl_08 stl_09">tribe.*</span><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_09">的时候，它是一个特殊的客户端，它可以连接多个集群，在所有连接的集群上执行 &nbsp;</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:10.3632em; left:7.7533em;"><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_09">搜索和其他操作。 &nbsp;</span></div>

                <div class="stl_01" style="top:15.4958em; left:5.3743em;"><span class="stl_32 stl_08 stl_09">1</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:16.6214em; left:5.3743em;"><span class="stl_32 stl_08 stl_09">2</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:17.7467em; left:5.3743em;"><span class="stl_32 stl_08 stl_09">3</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:18.8724em; left:5.3743em;"><span class="stl_32 stl_08 stl_09">4</span></div>

                <div class="stl_01" style="top:17.1842em; left:5.3745em;"><span class="stl_32 stl_08 stl_09">3</span></div>

                <div class="stl_01" style="top:20.5609em; left:5.3745em;"><span class="stl_32 stl_08 stl_09">6</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:21.6862em; left:5.3745em;"><span class="stl_32 stl_08 stl_09" style="word-spacing:0.7645em;">7 </span><span class="stl_35 stl_08 stl_09" style="word-spacing:0.7645em;">} &nbsp;</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:24.3066em; left:4.0017em;"><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_09">集群状态的三种颜色： &nbsp;</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:26.9954em; left:4.877em;"><span class="stl_60 stl_08 stl_09" style="font-weight:bold;">颜色 &nbsp;</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:26.9954em; left:13.2556em;"><span class="stl_60 stl_08 stl_09" style="font-weight:bold;">意义 &nbsp;</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:29.1269em; left:5.0646em;"><span class="stl_35 stl_08 stl_09">green &nbsp;</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:31.2526em; left:5.0646em;"><span class="stl_35 stl_08 stl_09">yellow &nbsp;</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:33.3786em; left:5.0646em;"><span class="stl_35 stl_08 stl_09">red &nbsp;</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:29.0588em; left:13.2556em;"><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_09">所有主要分片和复制分片都可用 &nbsp;</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:31.1845em; left:13.2556em;"><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_09">所有主要分片可用，但不是所有复制分片都可用 &nbsp;</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:33.3105em; left:13.2556em;"><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_09">不是所有的主要分片都可用 &nbsp;</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:36.0337em; left:4.0017em;"><span class="stl_26 stl_08 stl_09" style="font-weight:bold;">6</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:36.0337em; left:4.6976em;"><span class="stl_26 stl_08 stl_09" style="font-weight:bold;">.3</span><span class="stl_27 stl_08 stl_09" style="font-weight:bold;">、分片和副本 &nbsp;</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:38.5002em; left:4.0017em;"><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_21">为了将数据添加到</span><span class="stl_10 stl_08 stl_21">Elasticsearch</span><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_21">，我们需要</span><span class="stl_60 stl_08 stl_21" style="font-weight:bold;">索引</span><span class="stl_59 stl_08 stl_21" style="font-weight:bold;">(index)</span><span class="stl_10 stl_08 stl_21">——</span><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_21">一个存储关联数据的地方。实际上，索引只是一个用来 &nbsp;</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:39.7506em; left:4.0017em;"><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_24" style="word-spacing:0.0009em;">指向一个或多个</span><span class="stl_60 stl_08 stl_24" style="font-weight:bold; word-spacing:0.0009em;">分片</span><span class="stl_59 stl_08 stl_24" style="font-weight:bold; word-spacing:0.0009em;">(shards)</span><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_24" style="word-spacing:0.0009em;">的</span><span class="stl_59 stl_08 stl_24" style="font-weight:bold; word-spacing:0.0009em;">“</span><span class="stl_60 stl_08 stl_24" style="font-weight:bold; word-spacing:0.0009em;">逻辑命名空间</span><span class="stl_59 stl_08 stl_24" style="font-weight:bold; word-spacing:0.0009em;">(logical namespace)”</span><span class="stl_10 stl_08 stl_24" style="word-spacing:0.0009em;">. &nbsp;</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:41.689em; left:5.8775em;"><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_25" style="word-spacing:0.0015em;">一个分片</span><span class="stl_10 stl_08 stl_25" style="word-spacing:0.0015em;">(shard)</span><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_25" style="word-spacing:0.0015em;">是一个最小级别</span><span class="stl_10 stl_08 stl_25" style="word-spacing:0.0015em;">“</span><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_25" style="word-spacing:0.0015em;">工作单元</span><span class="stl_10 stl_08 stl_25" style="word-spacing:0.0015em;">(worker unit)”,</span><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_25" style="word-spacing:0.0015em;">它只是保存了索引中所有数据的一部分。 &nbsp;</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:42.9397em; left:5.8775em;"><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_09">我们需要知道是分片就是一个</span><span class="stl_10 stl_08 stl_09">Lucene</span><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_09">实例，并且它本身就是一个完整的搜索引擎。应用程序不会和它直接通 &nbsp;</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:44.19em; left:5.8775em;"><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_09">信。 &nbsp;</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:45.4407em; left:5.8775em;"><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_48" style="word-spacing:0.0029em;">分片可以是主分片</span><span class="stl_10 stl_08 stl_48" style="word-spacing:0.0029em;">(primary shard)</span><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_48" style="word-spacing:0.0029em;">或者是复制分片</span><span class="stl_10 stl_08 stl_48" style="word-spacing:0.0029em;">(replica shard)</span><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_48" style="word-spacing:0.0029em;">。 &nbsp;</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:46.691em; left:5.8775em;"><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_09">索引中的每个文档属于一个单独的主分片，所以主分片的数量决定了索引最多能存储多少数据。 &nbsp;</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:47.9417em; left:5.8775em;"><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_09">复制分片只是主分片的一个副本，它可以防止硬件故障导致的数据丢失，同时可以提供读请求，比如搜索或者 &nbsp;</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:49.1923em; left:5.8775em;"><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_20">从别的</span><span class="stl_10 stl_08 stl_20">shard</span><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_20">取回文档。 &nbsp;</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:50.4426em; left:5.8775em;"><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_09">当索引创建完成的时候，主分片的数量就固定了，但是复制分片的数量可以随时调整。 &nbsp;</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:52.5406em; left:4.0017em;"><span class="stl_26 stl_08 stl_09" style="font-weight:bold;">6</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:52.5406em; left:4.6976em;"><span class="stl_26 stl_08 stl_09" style="font-weight:bold;">.4</span><span class="stl_27 stl_08 stl_09" style="font-weight:bold;">、故障转移 &nbsp;</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:54.9618em; left:4.0017em;"><span class="stl_30 stl_08 stl_09" style="font-weight:bold;">6</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:54.9618em; left:4.5816em;"><span class="stl_30 stl_08 stl_09" style="font-weight:bold;">.4.1</span><span class="stl_31 stl_08 stl_09" style="font-weight:bold;">、将</span><span class="stl_30 stl_08 stl_09" style="font-weight:bold;">data</span><span class="stl_31 stl_08 stl_09" style="font-weight:bold;">节点停止 &nbsp;</span></div>

                <div class="stl_01" style="top:30.1842em; left:4.0017em;"><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_09">等待一段时间后，集群状态从黄色变为了绿色： &nbsp;</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:46.2535em; left:4.0017em;"><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_09">恢复</span><span class="stl_10 stl_08 stl_09">node01</span><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_09">节点： &nbsp;</span></div>

            <div class="stl_05 stl_06">
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:21.8056em; left:5.1897em;"><span class="stl_55 stl_08 stl_09" style="font-weight:bold;">特别说明： &nbsp;</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:23.6816em; left:5.1897em;"><span class="stl_50 stl_08 stl_47">如果在配置文件中</span><span class="stl_52 stl_08 stl_47">discovery.zen.minimum_master_nodes</span><span class="stl_50 stl_08 stl_47">设置的不是</span><span class="stl_52 stl_08 stl_47">N/2+1</span><span class="stl_50 stl_08 stl_47">时，会出现脑裂问题，之前宕机 &nbsp;</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:24.9319em; left:5.1897em;"><span class="stl_50 stl_08 stl_09">的主节点恢复后不会加入到集群。 &nbsp;</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:45.5376em; left:4.0017em;"><span class="stl_26 stl_08 stl_09" style="font-weight:bold;">6</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:45.5376em; left:4.6976em;"><span class="stl_26 stl_08 stl_09" style="font-weight:bold;">.5</span><span class="stl_27 stl_08 stl_09" style="font-weight:bold;">、分布式文档 &nbsp;</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:47.9589em; left:4.0017em;"><span class="stl_30 stl_08 stl_09" style="font-weight:bold;">6</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:47.9589em; left:4.5816em;"><span class="stl_30 stl_08 stl_09" style="font-weight:bold;">.5.1</span><span class="stl_31 stl_08 stl_09" style="font-weight:bold;">、路由 &nbsp;</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:50.1926em; left:4.0017em;"><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_09">首先，来看个问题： &nbsp;</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:67.063em; left:13.5417em;"><span class="stl_17 stl_18 stl_09">北京市昌平区建材城西路金燕龙办公楼一层 &nbsp;</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:67.063em; left:29.2917em;"><span class="stl_17 stl_18 stl_09">电话：400-618-9090 &nbsp;</span></div>

    <div class="stl_02">
        <div class="stl_03">
            <object data="030213185197_files/img_133.svg" type="image/svg+xml" class="stl_04" style="position:absolute; width:49.5833em; height:70.0833em;">
                <embed src="030213185197_files/img_133.svg" type="image/svg+xml" class="stl_04" />
            </object>
        </div>
        <div class="view">
            <div class="stl_05 stl_06">
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:20.8674em; left:4.0017em;"><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_09" style="word-spacing:0.0098em;">如图所示：当我们想一个集群保存文档时，文档该存储到哪个节点呢？ 是随机吗？ 是轮询吗？ &nbsp;</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:22.8059em; left:4.0017em;"><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_56">实际上，在</span><span class="stl_10 stl_08 stl_56">ELasticsearch</span><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_56">中，会采用计算的方式来确定存储到哪个节点，计算公式如下： &nbsp;</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:25.4375em; left:4.8741em;"><span class="stl_32 stl_08 stl_09">1</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:25.4375em; left:6.3152em;"><span class="stl_58 stl_08 stl_09" style="word-spacing:-0.0006em;">shard </span><span class="stl_41 stl_08 stl_09" style="word-spacing:-0.0006em;">= </span><span class="stl_58 stl_08 stl_09" style="word-spacing:-0.0006em;">hash</span><span class="stl_35 stl_08 stl_09" style="word-spacing:-0.0006em;">(</span><span class="stl_58 stl_08 stl_09" style="word-spacing:-0.0006em;">routing</span><span class="stl_35 stl_08 stl_09" style="word-spacing:-0.0006em;">) </span><span class="stl_41 stl_08 stl_09" style="word-spacing:-0.0006em;">% </span><span class="stl_58 stl_08 stl_09" style="word-spacing:-0.0006em;">number_of_primary_shards &nbsp;</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:28.0582em; left:7.0655em;"><span class="stl_52 stl_08 stl_23">routing</span><span class="stl_50 stl_08 stl_23">值是一个任意字符串，它默认是</span><span class="stl_52 stl_08 stl_23">_id</span><span class="stl_50 stl_08 stl_23">但也可以自定义。 &nbsp;</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:29.3085em; left:7.0655em;"><span class="stl_50 stl_08 stl_21">这个</span><span class="stl_52 stl_08 stl_21">routing</span><span class="stl_50 stl_08 stl_21">字符串通过哈希函数生成一个数字，然后除以主切片的数量得到一个余数</span><span class="stl_52 stl_08 stl_21">(remainder)</span><span class="stl_50 stl_08 stl_21">，余数 &nbsp;</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:30.5592em; left:7.0655em;"><span class="stl_50 stl_08 stl_56" style="word-spacing:0.0008em;">的范围永远是</span><span class="stl_52 stl_08 stl_56" style="word-spacing:0.0008em;">0</span><span class="stl_50 stl_08 stl_56" style="word-spacing:0.0008em;">到</span><span class="stl_52 stl_08 stl_56" style="word-spacing:0.0008em;">number_of_primary_shards - 1</span><span class="stl_50 stl_08 stl_56" style="word-spacing:0.0008em;">，这个数字就是特定文档所在的分片。 &nbsp;</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:32.4348em; left:4.0017em;"><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_09">这就是为什么创建了主分片后，不能修改的原因。 &nbsp;</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:34.453em; left:4.0017em;"><span class="stl_30 stl_08 stl_09" style="font-weight:bold;">6</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:34.453em; left:4.5816em;"><span class="stl_30 stl_08 stl_09" style="font-weight:bold;">.5.2</span><span class="stl_31 stl_08 stl_09" style="font-weight:bold;">、文档的写操作 &nbsp;</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:36.6868em; left:4.0017em;"><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_09">新建、索引和删除请求都是</span><span class="stl_60 stl_08 stl_09" style="font-weight:bold;">写</span><span class="stl_59 stl_08 stl_09" style="font-weight:bold;">(write)</span><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_09">操作，它们必须在主分片上成功完成才能复制到相关的复制分片上。 &nbsp;</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:57.9456em; left:4.0017em;"><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_09">下面我们罗列在主分片和复制分片上成功新建、索引或删除一个文档必要的顺序步骤： &nbsp;</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:59.8215em; left:5.0021em;"><span class="stl_10 stl_08 stl_09">1</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:59.8215em; left:5.4398em;"><span class="stl_10 stl_08 stl_105" style="word-spacing:-0.0265em;">. </span><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_105" style="word-spacing:-0.0265em;">客户端给 </span><span class="stl_35 stl_08 stl_106" style="word-spacing:-0.0294em;">Node 1</span><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_105" style="word-spacing:-0.0265em;">发送新建、索引或删除请求。 &nbsp;</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:61.1344em; left:5.4398em;"><span class="stl_10 stl_08 stl_107" style="word-spacing:-0.0606em;">. </span><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_107" style="word-spacing:-0.0606em;">节点使用文档的 </span><span class="stl_35 stl_08 stl_108" style="word-spacing:-0.0673em;">_id</span><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_107" style="word-spacing:-0.0606em;">确定文档属于分片 </span><span class="stl_35 stl_08 stl_108" style="word-spacing:-0.0673em;">0</span><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_107" style="word-spacing:-0.0606em;">。它转发请求到 </span><span class="stl_35 stl_08 stl_108" style="word-spacing:-0.0673em;">Node 3</span><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_107" style="word-spacing:-0.0606em;">，分片 </span><span class="stl_35 stl_08 stl_108" style="word-spacing:-0.0673em;">0</span><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_107" style="word-spacing:-0.0606em;">位于这个节点上。 &nbsp;</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:62.4475em; left:5.4398em;"><span class="stl_10 stl_08 stl_109" style="word-spacing:0.2133em;">. </span><span class="stl_35 stl_08 stl_110" style="word-spacing:0.237em;">Node</span><span class="stl_35 stl_08 stl_110" style="word-spacing:0.237em;"> 3</span><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_109" style="word-spacing:-0.0301em;">在主分片上执行请求，如果成功，它转发请求到相应的位于</span><span class="stl_35 stl_08 stl_110" style="word-spacing:-0.0548em;"> Node</span><span class="stl_35 stl_08 stl_110" style="word-spacing:-0.0548em;"> 1</span><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_109" style="word-spacing:-0.0301em;">和</span><span class="stl_35 stl_08 stl_110" style="word-spacing:-0.0548em;"> Node</span><span class="stl_35 stl_08 stl_110" style="word-spacing:-0.0548em;"> 2</span><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_109" style="word-spacing:-0.0301em;">的复制节点上。当所有 &nbsp;</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:63.7607em; left:5.8775em;"><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_111" style="word-spacing:-0.0224em;">的复制节点报告成功， </span><span class="stl_35 stl_08 stl_112" style="word-spacing:-0.0249em;">Node 3</span><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_111" style="word-spacing:-0.0224em;">报告成功到请求的节点，请求的节点再报告给客户端。 &nbsp;</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:61.1344em; left:5.0021em;"><span class="stl_10 stl_08 stl_09">2</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:62.4475em; left:5.0021em;"><span class="stl_10 stl_08 stl_09">3</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:67.063em; left:13.5417em;"><span class="stl_17 stl_18 stl_09">北京市昌平区建材城西路金燕龙办公楼一层 &nbsp;</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:67.063em; left:29.2917em;"><span class="stl_17 stl_18 stl_09">电话：400-618-9090 &nbsp;</span></div>
            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
    <div class="stl_02">
        <div class="stl_03">
            <object data="030213185197_files/img_135.svg" type="image/svg+xml" class="stl_04" style="position:absolute; width:49.5833em; height:70.0833em;">
                <embed src="030213185197_files/img_135.svg" type="image/svg+xml" class="stl_04" />
            </object>
        </div>
        <div class="view">
            <div class="stl_05 stl_06">
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:4.9234em; left:4.0017em;"><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_09">客户端接收到成功响应的时候，文档的修改已经被应用于主分片和所有的复制分片。你的修改生效了。 &nbsp;</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:6.9416em; left:4.0017em;"><span class="stl_30 stl_08 stl_09" style="font-weight:bold;">6</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:6.9416em; left:4.5816em;"><span class="stl_30 stl_08 stl_09" style="font-weight:bold;">.5.3</span><span class="stl_31 stl_08 stl_09" style="font-weight:bold;">、搜索文档（单个文档） &nbsp;</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:9.1754em; left:4.0017em;"><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_09">文档能够从主分片或任意一个复制分片被检索。 &nbsp;</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:26.745em; left:4.0017em;"><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_09">下面我们罗列在主分片或复制分片上检索一个文档必要的顺序步骤： &nbsp;</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:28.621em; left:5.0021em;"><span class="stl_10 stl_08 stl_09">1</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:28.621em; left:5.4398em;"><span class="stl_10 stl_08 stl_113" style="word-spacing:-0.0352em;">. </span><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_113" style="word-spacing:-0.0352em;">客户端给 </span><span class="stl_35 stl_08 stl_114" style="word-spacing:-0.0391em;">Node 1</span><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_113" style="word-spacing:-0.0352em;">发送</span><span class="stl_10 stl_08 stl_113" style="word-spacing:-0.0352em;">get</span><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_113" style="word-spacing:-0.0352em;">请求。 &nbsp;</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:29.9342em; left:5.4398em;"><span class="stl_10 stl_08 stl_115" style="word-spacing:-0.0427em;">. </span><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_115" style="word-spacing:-0.0427em;">节点使用文档的 </span><span class="stl_35 stl_08 stl_116" style="word-spacing:-0.0474em;">_id</span><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_115" style="word-spacing:-0.0427em;">确定文档属于分片 </span><span class="stl_35 stl_08 stl_116" style="word-spacing:-0.0474em;">0</span><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_115" style="word-spacing:-0.0427em;">。分片 </span><span class="stl_35 stl_08 stl_116" style="word-spacing:-0.0474em;">0</span><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_115" style="word-spacing:-0.0427em;">对应的复制分片在三个节点上都有。此时，它转发请求到 &nbsp;</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:31.247em; left:6.065em;"><span class="stl_35 stl_08 stl_117" style="word-spacing:-0.1281em;">Node 2</span><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_118" style="word-spacing:-0.1153em;">。 &nbsp;</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:29.9342em; left:5.0021em;"><span class="stl_10 stl_08 stl_09">2</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:32.5601em; left:5.0021em;"><span class="stl_10 stl_08 stl_119" style="word-spacing:0.2157em;">3. </span><span class="stl_35 stl_08 stl_120" style="word-spacing:0.2397em;">Node</span><span class="stl_35 stl_08 stl_120" style="word-spacing:0.2397em;"> 2</span><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_119" style="word-spacing:-0.0276em;">返回文档</span><span class="stl_10 stl_08 stl_119" style="word-spacing:-0.0276em;">(document)</span><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_119" style="word-spacing:-0.0276em;">给</span><span class="stl_35 stl_08 stl_120" style="word-spacing:-0.0528em;"> Node</span><span class="stl_35 stl_08 stl_120" style="word-spacing:-0.0528em;"> 1</span><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_119" style="word-spacing:-0.0276em;">然后返回给客户端。 &nbsp;</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:34.5611em; left:4.0017em;"><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_09">对于读请求，为了平衡负载，请求节点会为每个请求选择不同的分片</span><span class="stl_10 stl_08 stl_09">——</span><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_09">它会循环所有分片副本。 &nbsp;</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:36.4368em; left:4.0017em;"><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_09">可能的情况是，一个被索引的文档已经存在于主分片上却还没来得及同步到复制分片上。这时复制分片会报告文档未 &nbsp;</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:37.6874em; left:4.0017em;"><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_09">找到，主分片会成功返回文档。一旦索引请求成功返回给用户，文档则在主分片和复制分片都是可用的。 &nbsp;</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:39.7053em; left:4.0017em;"><span class="stl_30 stl_08 stl_09" style="font-weight:bold;">6</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:39.7053em; left:4.5816em;"><span class="stl_30 stl_08 stl_09" style="font-weight:bold;">.5.4</span><span class="stl_31 stl_08 stl_09" style="font-weight:bold;">、全文搜索 &nbsp;</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:41.939em; left:4.0017em;"><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_09">对于全文搜索而言，文档可能分散在各个节点上，那么在分布式的情况下，如何搜索文档呢？ &nbsp;</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:43.8775em; left:4.0017em;"><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_09">搜索，分为</span><span class="stl_10 stl_08 stl_09">2</span><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_09">个阶段，搜索（</span><span class="stl_10 stl_08 stl_09">query</span><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_09">）</span><span class="stl_10 stl_08 stl_09">+</span><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_09">取回（</span><span class="stl_10 stl_08 stl_09">fetch</span><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_09">）。 &nbsp;</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:45.7532em; left:5.1897em;"><span class="stl_50 stl_08 stl_09">搜索（</span><span class="stl_52 stl_08 stl_09">query</span><span class="stl_50 stl_08 stl_09">） &nbsp;</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:67.063em; left:13.5417em;"><span class="stl_17 stl_18 stl_09">北京市昌平区建材城西路金燕龙办公楼一层 &nbsp;</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:67.063em; left:29.2917em;"><span class="stl_17 stl_18 stl_09">电话：400-618-9090 &nbsp;</span></div>
            </div>
        </div>
    </div>

        <div class="stl_03">
            <object data="030213185197_files/img_138.svg" type="image/svg+xml" class="stl_04" style="position:absolute; width:49.5833em; height:70.0833em;">
                <embed src="030213185197_files/img_138.svg" type="image/svg+xml" class="stl_04" />

        <div class="view">
            <div class="stl_05 stl_06">
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:24.2444em; left:4.0017em;"><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_09">查询阶段包含以下三步： &nbsp;</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:26.1825em; left:5.0021em;"><span class="stl_10 stl_08 stl_09">1</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:26.1825em; left:5.4398em;"><span class="stl_10 stl_08 stl_109" style="word-spacing:-0.0388em;">. </span><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_109" style="word-spacing:-0.0388em;">客户端发送一个 </span><span class="stl_35 stl_08 stl_110" style="word-spacing:-0.0431em;">search</span><span class="stl_42 stl_08 stl_110" style="word-spacing:-0.0431em;">（搜索） </span><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_109" style="word-spacing:-0.0388em;">请求给 </span><span class="stl_35 stl_08 stl_110" style="word-spacing:-0.0431em;">Node 3</span><span class="stl_10 stl_08 stl_109" style="word-spacing:-0.0388em;">, </span><span class="stl_35 stl_08 stl_110" style="word-spacing:-0.0431em;">Node 3</span><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_109" style="word-spacing:-0.0388em;">创建了一个长度为 </span><span class="stl_35 stl_08 stl_110" style="word-spacing:-0.0431em;">from+size</span><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_109" style="word-spacing:-0.0388em;">的空优先级队 &nbsp;</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:27.4957em; left:5.4398em;"><span class="stl_10 stl_08 stl_09" style="word-spacing:0.2434em;">. </span><span class="stl_35 stl_08 stl_09" style="word-spacing:0.2704em;">Node</span><span class="stl_35 stl_08 stl_09" style="word-spacing:0em;"> 3</span><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_09" style="word-spacing:-0.0519em;"> 转发这个搜索请求到索引中每个分片的原本或副本。每个分片在本地执行这个查询并且结果将结果到 &nbsp;</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:28.8085em; left:5.8775em;"><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_121" style="word-spacing:-0.0384em;">一个大小为 </span><span class="stl_35 stl_08 stl_122" style="word-spacing:-0.0427em;">from+size</span><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_121" style="word-spacing:-0.0384em;">的有序本地优先队列里去。 &nbsp;</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:27.4957em; left:5.0021em;"><span class="stl_10 stl_08 stl_09">2</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:30.1217em; left:5.0021em;"><span class="stl_10 stl_08 stl_123" style="word-spacing:-0.0212em;">3. </span><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_123" style="word-spacing:-0.0212em;">每个分片返回</span><span class="stl_10 stl_08 stl_123" style="word-spacing:-0.0212em;">document</span><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_123" style="word-spacing:-0.0212em;">的</span><span class="stl_10 stl_08 stl_123" style="word-spacing:-0.0212em;">ID</span><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_123" style="word-spacing:-0.0212em;">和它优先队列里的所有</span><span class="stl_10 stl_08 stl_123" style="word-spacing:-0.0212em;">document</span><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_123" style="word-spacing:-0.0212em;">的排序值给协调节点 </span><span class="stl_35 stl_08 stl_124" style="word-spacing:-0.0236em;">Node 3</span><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_123" style="word-spacing:-0.0212em;">。 </span><span class="stl_35 stl_08 stl_124" style="word-spacing:-0.0236em;">Node 3</span><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_123" style="word-spacing:-0.0212em;">把这些 &nbsp;</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:31.4348em; left:5.8775em;"><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_09">值合并到自己的优先队列里产生全局排序结果。 &nbsp;</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:33.3105em; left:5.1897em;"><span class="stl_50 stl_08 stl_09">取回（</span><span class="stl_52 stl_08 stl_09">fetch</span><span class="stl_50 stl_08 stl_09">） &nbsp;</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:54.5696em; left:4.0017em;"><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_09">分发阶段由以下步骤构成： &nbsp;</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:56.4452em; left:5.0021em;"><span class="stl_10 stl_08 stl_09">1</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:56.4452em; left:5.4398em;"><span class="stl_10 stl_08 stl_125" style="word-spacing:-0.0166em;">. </span><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_125" style="word-spacing:-0.0166em;">协调节点辨别出哪个</span><span class="stl_10 stl_08 stl_125" style="word-spacing:-0.0166em;">document</span><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_125" style="word-spacing:-0.0166em;">需要取回，并且向相关分片发出 </span><span class="stl_35 stl_08 stl_126" style="word-spacing:-0.0184em;">GET</span><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_125" style="word-spacing:-0.0166em;">请求。 &nbsp;</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:57.7584em; left:5.4398em;"><span class="stl_10 stl_08 stl_09" style="word-spacing:0.0126em;">. </span><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_09" style="word-spacing:0.0126em;">每个分片加载</span><span class="stl_10 stl_08 stl_09" style="word-spacing:0.0126em;">document</span><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_09" style="word-spacing:0.0126em;">并且根据需要</span><span class="stl_127 stl_08 stl_09" style="font-style:italic; word-spacing:2.7498em;"> enrich</span><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_09" style="word-spacing:0.7488em;"> 它们，然后再将</span><span class="stl_10 stl_08 stl_09" style="word-spacing:0.7488em;">document</span><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_09" style="word-spacing:0.7488em;">返回协调节点。 &nbsp;</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:59.0087em; left:5.4398em;"><span class="stl_10 stl_08 stl_09" style="word-spacing:0.0126em;">. </span><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_09" style="word-spacing:0.0126em;">一旦所有的</span><span class="stl_10 stl_08 stl_09" style="word-spacing:0.0126em;">document</span><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_09" style="word-spacing:0.0126em;">都被取回，协调节点会将结果返回给客户端。 &nbsp;</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:57.7584em; left:5.0021em;"><span class="stl_10 stl_08 stl_09">2</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:59.0087em; left:5.0021em;"><span class="stl_10 stl_08 stl_09">3</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:60.9992em; left:4.0017em;"><span class="stl_15 stl_08 stl_09" style="font-weight:bold;">7</span><span class="stl_07 stl_08 stl_09" style="font-weight:bold;">、</span><span class="stl_15 stl_08 stl_09" style="font-weight:bold;">Java</span><span class="stl_07 stl_08 stl_09" style="font-weight:bold;">客户端 &nbsp;</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:64.0735em; left:4.0017em;"><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_16" style="word-spacing:0.0007em;">在</span><span class="stl_10 stl_08 stl_16" style="word-spacing:0.0007em;">Elasticsearch</span><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_16" style="word-spacing:0.0007em;">中，为</span><span class="stl_10 stl_08 stl_16" style="word-spacing:0.0007em;">java</span><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_16" style="word-spacing:0.0007em;">提供了</span><span class="stl_10 stl_08 stl_16" style="word-spacing:0.0007em;">2</span><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_16" style="word-spacing:0.0007em;">种客户端，一种是</span><span class="stl_10 stl_08 stl_16" style="word-spacing:0.0007em;">REST</span><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_16" style="word-spacing:0.0007em;">风格的客户端，另一种是</span><span class="stl_10 stl_08 stl_16" style="word-spacing:0.0007em;">Java API</span><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_16" style="word-spacing:0.0007em;">的客户端。 &nbsp;</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:67.063em; left:13.5417em;"><span class="stl_17 stl_18 stl_09">北京市昌平区建材城西路金燕龙办公楼一层 &nbsp;</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:67.063em; left:29.2917em;"><span class="stl_17 stl_18 stl_09">电话：400-618-9090 &nbsp;</span></div>
            </div>

        <div class="view">
            <div class="stl_05 stl_06">
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:4.9234em; left:4.0017em;"><a href="https://www.elastic.co/guide/en/elasticsearch/client/index.html" target="_blank"><span class="stl_29 stl_08 stl_49">https://www.elastic.co/guide/en/elasticsearch/client/index.html &nbsp;</span></a></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:34.8456em; left:4.0017em;"><span class="stl_26 stl_08 stl_09" style="font-weight:bold;">7</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:34.8456em; left:4.6976em;"><span class="stl_26 stl_08 stl_09" style="font-weight:bold;">.1</span><span class="stl_27 stl_08 stl_09" style="font-weight:bold;">、</span><span class="stl_26 stl_08 stl_09" style="font-weight:bold;">REST</span><span class="stl_27 stl_08 stl_09" style="font-weight:bold;">客户端 &nbsp;</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:37.3121em; left:4.0017em;"><span class="stl_10 stl_08 stl_24">Elasticsearch</span><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_24">提供了</span><span class="stl_10 stl_08 stl_24">2</span><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_24">种</span><span class="stl_10 stl_08 stl_24">REST</span><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_24">客户端，一种是低级客户端，一种是高级客户端。 &nbsp;</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:39.2502em; left:5.8775em;"><span class="stl_10 stl_08 stl_22" style="word-spacing:0.0019em;">Java Low Level REST Client</span><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_22" style="word-spacing:0.0019em;">：官方提供的低级客户端。该客户端通过</span><span class="stl_10 stl_08 stl_22" style="word-spacing:0.0019em;">http</span><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_22" style="word-spacing:0.0019em;">来连接</span><span class="stl_10 stl_08 stl_22" style="word-spacing:0.0019em;">Elasticsearch</span><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_22" style="word-spacing:0.0019em;">集群。用户在使 &nbsp;</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:40.5009em; left:5.8775em;"><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_56">用该客户端时需要将请求数据手动拼接成</span><span class="stl_10 stl_08 stl_56">Elasticsearch</span><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_56">所需</span><span class="stl_10 stl_08 stl_56">JSON</span><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_56">格式进行发送，收到响应时同样也需要将返回 &nbsp;</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:41.7515em; left:5.8775em;"><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_56">的</span><span class="stl_10 stl_08 stl_56">JSON</span><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_56">数据手动封装成对象。虽然麻烦，不过该客户端兼容所有的</span><span class="stl_10 stl_08 stl_56">Elasticsearch</span><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_56">版本。 &nbsp;</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:43.0019em; left:5.8775em;"><span class="stl_10 stl_08 stl_56" style="word-spacing:0.0008em;">Java High Level REST Client</span><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_56" style="word-spacing:0.0008em;">：官方提供的高级客户端。该客户端基于低级客户端实现，它提供了很多便捷的 &nbsp;</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:44.2525em; left:5.8775em;"><span class="stl_10 stl_08 stl_09">API</span><span class="stl_11 stl_08 stl_09">来解决低级客户端需要手动转换数据格式的问题。 &nbsp;</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:46.3505em; left:4.0017em;"><span class="stl_26 stl_08 stl_09" style="font-weight:bold;">7</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:46.3505em; left:4.6976em;"><span class="stl_26 stl_08 stl_09" style="font-weight:bold;">.2</span><span class="stl_27 stl_08 stl_09" style="font-weight:bold;">、构造数据 &nbsp;</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:49.3851em; left:5.3743em;"><span class="stl_32 stl_08 stl_09">1</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:50.5107em; left:5.3743em;"><span class="stl_32 stl_08 stl_09">2</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:51.6361em; left:5.3743em;"><span class="stl_32 stl_08 stl_09">3</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:52.7617em; left:5.3743em;"><span class="stl_32 stl_08 stl_09">4</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:53.887em; left:5.3743em;"><span class="stl_32 stl_08 stl_09">5</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:55.0127em; left:5.3743em;"><span class="stl_32 stl_08 stl_09">6</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:56.138em; left:5.3743em;"><span class="stl_32 stl_08 stl_09">7</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:57.2633em; left:5.3743em;"><span class="stl_32 stl_08 stl_09">8</span></div>
                <div class="stl_01" style="top:58.389em; left:5.3743em;"><span class="stl_32 stl_08 stl_09">9</span></div>
